Reviews.Content: The Samsung Chromebook is awesome. It's small, light as a feather, and as soon as you open it up it's online. It fits in my purse! I have a large HP work laptop that I barely use anymore because of the Chromebook.

Reviews.Title: if you need something highly portable, and fast, get it.
Reviews.Author: Antoine adams
Reviews.Content: if you want a game machine, or supreme entertainment laptop, do not bother. the laptop is very basic, but it gets the job done. i suggest using this in conjunction with a windows computer... this would be for school, Netflix in the car, and browsing on the go, the windows computer would be for everything else...

Reviews.Title: Good price / specs rate
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Iacobaci
Reviews.Content: Is a good machine, better than a tablet but less than a real notebook. It is just for I bought.

Reviews.Title: Super Nice
Reviews.Author: papajoe
Reviews.Content: Large keyboard, and the "mouse" works very well. A lightweight Book, with many available apps from Google. Buy it now.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great product
Reviews.Author: nnikunen
Reviews.Content: Works excellent, very portable, solid build and a great buy.  Perfect for browsing and daily usage.  Awesome battery life, couldn't have made a better choice.

Reviews.Title: Good for students
Reviews.Author: Willard Hughes
Reviews.Content: I am a student and needed a light-weight laptop for school note taking and papers and such. This is perfect. It is very light-weight, very slim, easily fits with my books in my backpack. The keyboard did take some getting use to and once I learned I could customize some of the keys it made it easier. Also the Chrome part takes some getting use to. Its not like a regular laptop, its more like a giant android with a lot of the same restrictions. But for a second laptop it is perfect. I love mine.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Sue Ford
Reviews.Content: Although I'm still getting to know it, I really like this little netbook!  Its quick, love the regular keyboard and although the Google ap is slightly different to use I was already familiar with much of it from using Gmail.  It has good battery life and I use it as my only computer.  Its light weight and thin to carry around...really no bulkier than a ledger pad.  I love the scroll feature in the touch pad. Printing is easy once I got my printer synced up, but I can't think of any problems!  Working on files, etc offline is no problem and I really appreciate that new emails are kept in drafts and not dumped in case of a sudden shut down!  Great value!

Reviews.Title: Love it but is now randomly restarting
Reviews.Author: missdarkstar "missdarkstar"
Reviews.Content: I do love the chromebook. it's lightweight and fast-booting. My biggest thing is that after using it for a couple months, it is beginning to randomly restart. This usually happens when I watch youtube videos for more than 25 minutes. I don't know if youtube's site is really the problem or not but after restart and logging it, it seems to be fine. The restarts happpen about 3-4 times per week with daily use. There's not much to the chromebook or the OS so i'm not sure what i am doing wrong here.The build quality is fine but expect thin, cheap plastic. So far, the body of the chromebook it holding up well. This is something I can throw in my bag and go.If the random restarting is resolved, i'll update my review.

Reviews.Title: Quality device for a quality price!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Wenzel
Reviews.Content: Awesome device. Does exactly what I need for the money. Internet browsing,  streaming video and word processing. Must buy for anyone in the market.

Reviews.Title: College students look no further!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something that I could bring to school (not LUG to school) to take notes on and easily access the internet for research. The chromebook has allowed me to do that and much more. Working strictly from the cloud takes some getting used to and so does crossing over from whatever typical word processors or spreadsheets you are used to using, but once you do the benefit of being able to access those docs and spreadsheets (or presentations, etc.) from anywhere outweighs the learning curve. I thought that not having a large hard drive would bug me but since I use my desktop for all downloads it really hasn't hindered anything I've tried to do. I would insert a caveat here and that being, if you don't have another computer (laptop with a large hard drive or desktop), I wouldn't choose this computer simply because there are some things that chrome os (although I love it) cannot do and you don't have storage space for large downloads.The price point is also a huge plus for many of us students who don't the discretionary income to drop on a macbook. I highly recommend this product. Google is a leader in innovation and Samsung makes quality products. This is one of those innovative, quality products which I have found extremely useful.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook doesn't do everything
Reviews.Author: Francisco P Sirvent
Reviews.Content: Unexpected limitations: can't plug USB printer into USB port (can only print to cloud), can't install Dropbox or Skype. Loved the GUI and size and weight. But it does not replace the need for another home computer.

Reviews.Title: This is exactly what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Billie Lowe
Reviews.Content: I have an iMac desktop computer but I was tired of being stuck at the desk. I got this little gem and it is perfect for what I needed it for. I get to sit on the couch and surf the internet, facebook, facebook games and I can even print from it! I still use my mac for the office/business stuff, but if I just wanna surf the net and do light office work, this is perfect. And for the money, you really can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: Best mobile unit available for the $.
Reviews.Author: horshu
Reviews.Content: Cannot believe the speed and portability of this device. For accessing the web in a flash, and all the things I do.. At a more than affordable price. Printing can be achieved through another connected PC and 'cloud print' installed on both devices.

Reviews.Title: great buy , my wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Wickdbear
Reviews.Content: my wife uses it daily , its fast smooth , and easy to use . It a little different from windows but after some time she grew to love it , never crashes , holds a super long charge , and is an easy email/facbook/hulu/netflix machine for her .

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Vincent
Reviews.Content: Great for my web surfing and for my kids to do their school portal stuff and online gaming on their own . Cheaper than I buy from my own country. However I have issue running excel for my office stuff when I use the google drive.

Reviews.Title: Actually Surprising!
Reviews.Author: SamiYolo
Reviews.Content: This laptop is all that i've been looking for! I love it very much and it's perfect for college or when you want to have something so simple and easy to organize and manage. The only 5 things are:1- No skype2- It's all based on WiFi unless you search for offline apps on the store3- There's no Caps Lock button for some reason, maybe a manufacturer glitch4- It didn't come with the Chrome Sticker if you get the refurbished5- You cannot drag files to your desktop as icons (isn't that weird?) This does save you some organization and space thoughOverall this is a 9/10. The 4 things do not over power the fact that it is such an amazing interface, keyboard, hardware, software, and chrome OS is so simple! Not to mention for me, the refurbished was cheap! So get yourself a chromebook if you're a college student or you want something extremely simple.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the average student
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: If you only need a notebook that can write papers and go on the internet, this is perfect. The small size makes it extremely portable and the SSD gives it a quick boot time.  Though, this notebook should only be used for basic needs. Anything more than watching a video on youtube should be done on a better machine. I personally have a desktop PC in my dorm and carry this chromebook to my classes and it works just fine. Also, if you need to access a high-demanding program, there is the option to use google remote desktop. What this does is allows you to control your desktop (mine is in my dorm) from your notebook. This allows you to use high-demanding programs on your desktop from anywhere with an internet connection.This chromebook is great for someone looking for a portable machine, but should also have a better desktop at home.

Reviews.Title: A Chromebook for the mature crowd.
Reviews.Author: R. Matthews
Reviews.Content: A review for the mature crowd, on using the Chromebook as your go to computer.  It actually is a 5 star but I gave it 4 because the size leaves just a little on the "wanting/needs" list.I've been using computers since 1979 and now at 72 I’m using a Samsung 11.3” Chromebook and the whole Google Chrome OS experience.  At 250 bucks it’s a great deal for what it does because it does it flawlessly, with minor exceptions.  The Chromebook size is almost perfect as a convenient door into the internet.  At about the size of a pad of paper it has all you need.  All the positive marketing points of the machine and Google Chrome OS system are true. For the majority of the population it fills our needs and is as simple as it gets.  If you use MS Internet Explorer the first thing you will notice is Google Chrome has eliminated every annoying attribute MS-IE ever invented.  Be honest with yourself and think about what you really do on your personal home computer.  If you feel the need for a Microsoft OS along with all the annoying security and daily updates in addition to the same for MS Office on a 1500 buck desktop maybe you should consider incorporating your family and hiring an IT guy too.  Personally I feel Google is the future of internet computing for the world.As to the negative aspects of using the Chromebook as my “go to” computer.  After three weeks of using the Samsung 11.3" Chromebook the screen is still difficult to see and hard on my eyes.  Adjustments have been made for larger fonts and color changes have been made on some reading materials.  Could be because this reviewer wears bifocal eye glasses but it’s more than that.  There just isn’t much real estate to move things around especially when it comes to photos.  The clarity of the screen just doesn't pop out at you as would be the case in the Chromebook Pixel (I’m assuming).  However more to the point is the color or contrast on some web pages.  An example is Google Calendar,  the type just doesn't have good contrast.. One major problem on some web pages is the page does not fit on the screen.  I’m not a web designer so  I’m not sure where the problem is, the web, the Chromebook or Google. An example: I was on the Delta Airline reservations site and I could not use it to make my reservations because some of the page was overlaid and jumbled.  Same problems happened on many other sites where you have selection options in ordering things.Again, for the 250 bucks delivered into your house it is a steal.  It is really the perfect “recliner” companion for wireless surfing the web and general research/entertainment needs. Plus Google has so many “apps” you could spend the rest of your life just setting those up for “whatever”.

Reviews.Title: Good to have
Reviews.Author: J. Melara
Reviews.Content: It's made in China, but this really is a lovely computer.  It's lightweight and the battery lasts a fairly long time.

Reviews.Title: Unit purchased as new proved to be used
Reviews.Author: Celiakelly
Reviews.Content: This Chromebook was purchased as a new item. We found that it had been previously used as there was a "user" logged in whose profile had to be erased before we could use the unit.

Reviews.Title: Nice price and gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: After my old laptop broke down on me I was looking for something relatively cheap but decent as well. The Chromebook gets the job done. It's lightweight yet sturdy and sets up in just minutes. All I really do is surf the net and work on my documents and this is sufficient. One major thing to note: some programs that you may be used to (such as iTunes) are not compatible with Chromebook. I'm not a big fan of how all the outlets are on the back on the computer, either. But other than that I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The overall of this laptop is good condition and it meets my need! I love it! Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Diane Brainard "Diane"
Reviews.Content: you certainly can not beat it for the price.  The keyboard is easy,nice size not cramped.  The computer is user friendly, just had to get used to not having a right and left "click".  I was worried about the quality when purchased, but would not hesitate to buy another one.  It is great for basic needs.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop.
Reviews.Author: A. Paulley
Reviews.Content: This laptop is great.  However, I do recommend that you do your research before buying this laptop so that you know what your getting yourself into.  I bought it to do school work since my 3 year old dell laptop was acting up and this one has not given me any problems and gives great battery life.  If you need more functionality you can install ubuntu beside chrome OS.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Hughey
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love, love this computer. I wanted something very light and portable to use for internet surfing and this fills the bill. It is very well made and the keyboard is comfortable to use. It runs very fast for such a small pc; I can't believe how fast it boots up. Also, the battery is great, and stays charged for a long time. It is the best $249 I've spent in a long time.

Reviews.Title: A computer on the go without weighing you down.
Reviews.Author: Phillip J Yap-Diangco
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a side computer.  Its really meant for traveling to coffee shops/libraries to do work as well as on vacation trip.  Its great for surfing and the battery life is amazing (3-4 if streaming video, 6 hours normal surfing)  People who work with MS Office will have a learning curve since all the productivity apps are web based.  I wouldn't recommend this as a main computer . . . no dvd . . . not a great sound . . . occasional disconnects from wifi . . . web based google apps only . . . certain printers are only compatible (unless you installed the google cloud printer) . . . seriously make sure that all the things you want to do on a computer can be done on a chrome book . . . you will be surprise.

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal
Reviews.Author: Animation360
Reviews.Content: this laptop is great, I love it. for less then three bills you can not beat it. anyone that says different is nuts

Reviews.Title: Even better than I expected!
Reviews.Author: TheMK
Reviews.Content: I'm quite pleased with how much this little machine can do.  I hardly need my heavier, full-blown laptop any more.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Angie Schrantz
Reviews.Content: Very light, works great, however doesn't have slot for DVD...didn't realize this...:(  I like that it's easy to use, out of the box and logging in in minutes.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for light usage!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Sherwood "Nancie Quinton"
Reviews.Content: I am not a fan of tablets and wanted a qwerty keyboard.  The Chromebook is perfect for people like me!  Everything is fast and the auto updates are great.  This was never intended to be my daily laptop so I cannot give advice on how it would work for that.  If you want something for browsing, watching movies in bed, etc this is perfect.  It's very light weight and everything runs fast.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Machine
Reviews.Author: Brian Barlow
Reviews.Content: Fastest Browsing Experience Ever!  Highly recommend this laptop.  Boots extremely fast because all the applications are in the Google Cloud.

Reviews.Title: light, fast, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Peter Geng
Reviews.Content: really fast when boot up,the keyboard is very comfortable,chromos is easy to use.the screen is not very good.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gloria Moran
Reviews.Content: The chrome is so user friendly, for those of us that do not like to struggle with computers.  The best thing about you do not have too wait long for anything to load up.  It is Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Umm
Reviews.Author: KD Bancroft
Reviews.Content: I've been using the Samsung Chromebook for about 6 months now and it's not bad, but it's not really good either. Mainly, it doesn't necessarily fit what I need to do as a laptop user. I'm big on recording and gaming, and this laptop absolutely isn't for that. The battery life is good, but if you leave the laptop to get too hot, then it has a knack for randomly freezing up and cutting off. It heats up very quickly because there is no built in fan, due to the size of the Chromebook. It is very light and easy to travel with, which was a plus because I am in the military and do a lot of traveling. However, I'd suggest looking into another laptop with and all around features and not something that limits you to Chrome OS.

Reviews.Title: Good for web use
Reviews.Author: Catherine Paulson
Reviews.Content: I really like this computer for surfing the web and watch videos online. If you need it to write papers or for any of the Microsoft Office Suite this is not the computer for you. I like it because it is small and portable and does all the task I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Alicia Crone
Reviews.Content: this is one of the best computers iv'e ever used in my life. is light weight its just as fast as they say its going to be. at first it is hard to get used to only being able to use thing that are google compatible but once you get used to it you realize its actually better and safer. it automatically updates and protects itself from spam. for 250 dollars this is a GREAT investment

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Samantha M. Carey
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. It suits all my needs and I'm looking forward to using google docs for school. The only thing that I don't like, which I hope will be updated soon, is I am unable to access google play to down load apps. I keep getting a message saying I need to access the google play store app (the white shopping bag icon). I don't even know where the white shopping bag is so how am I supposed to be able to access it? Can anyone help me out with this?

Reviews.Title: Love the Chromebook
Reviews.Author: ellen sue smith
Reviews.Content: Performed just as advertised..Very fast, great size and color and excellent sound. The set up was very easy also. Recommend this...

Reviews.Title: Met and exceeded my expectations.
Reviews.Author: J. Stuart Cundiff
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted. Not cluttered with a lot of programs that I will never use. Gave only four stars because I wanted to us it for Skype and can't.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Jose Diaz
Reviews.Content: I chose 5 stars cuz it works perfect for my needs, i'd recommend it for everyone. It's much better than a tablet and super portable.

Reviews.Title: Very Good!!
Reviews.Author: angel gandia
Reviews.Content: Nice design, and good quality for your money!!!The feel and look is very nice. This product is amazing, just love it!!

Reviews.Title: Great product- buy it!
Reviews.Author: Johnny Galt "Who is Guy Fawkes?"
Reviews.Content: We are very impressed with this laptop.  Easy, crystal clear and extremely easy set-up and use.  It has replaced our old $1,200 laptop.

Reviews.Title: Love that computer
Reviews.Author: Frances K.
Reviews.Content: We got this computer for my daughter to do online school.  She loves it because it is light and fast.  She is able to do her assignments on it.  The charge the computer holds is for about 8 or 9 hours.  Mine only holds a charge for about one hour and then it is dead.  Being ligjt is very important to her.

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: melissa
Reviews.Content: this laptop is definitely worth getting if your looking for a laptop for your kids or looking for a secondary laptop. for the price its at its a pretty decent solid laptop

Reviews.Title: Surprise!
Reviews.Author: Linda Stevens
Reviews.Content: This will be my next big purchase if its anything like this one. I show everybody that talks about getting a computer. The speed is phenomenal! No drivers are ever downloaded. It just seems to know everything. Peripherals are instantly accessible. I can't wait for my other computers to crash and you know they will! Ha! What has taken so long for this to hit the market? Well done Chrome! Well done.

Reviews.Title: Can't be beat
Reviews.Author: Marko
Reviews.Content: Simple to use, updates itself, perfect for almost everything.  This is a thin, light, easy to use laptop.  It charges quickly and lasts for a good period of time on a charge.  It's not for gaming or graphics intensive applications.  It is perfect for web, email, Google docs, Google hangouts, chat, etc.  You can only install apps from the Chrome App Store so don't expect to use MS Word or Excel but you can use the free Google docs equivalents that offer almost all the same functionality.  It is limited when you use it offline but the available apps for offline use are increasing.  I've switched to using this thing on a daily basis.  It still can't replace my heavy duty desktop for things like photo editing or encoding videos but it does 90% of the things I use daily better than Windows 8 or Mac OS (I also have a MacBook Air and Toshiba Portege which mostly collect dust now).

Reviews.Title: Everything I needed and more
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Let's start with first the service. As usual amazon surpassed my expectations by delivering my Chromebook a day before scheduled!! I got the best price I could find online with amazon. Have been a faithful customer for years and I don't see that changing anytime soon. Now as for the Chromebook, I would like to say that with this computer you want to be sure you know what your getting. I did my homework and researched for weeks before settling down to buy this laptop. I think its important to remember that this is all about the internet. I am fine "living in the cloud". but its not for everyone. I love the size, ease of use, and functionality of this laptop. I have to say I was worried about the keyboard with its lack of certain keys I'm used to but I have fallen in love with the search key!! I will be in the middle of reading something and want to research more and instead of opening a new tab and going to google I can just tap one key start typing and have a new window come up. I am very have with my purchase and would encourage potential buyers to do some research and take the leap into the cloud with this device. Happy shopping :-)

Reviews.Title: What I had been looking for in a tablet for so long, I found in a Chromebook
Reviews.Author: thedude42
Reviews.Content: I needed a platform powerful enough to do content production (typing in a text editor) and the usual internet stuffs, but cheap enough that if I destroyed it because it was in my backpack while I was riding my skateboard and I fell, I wouldn't be too terribly upset.What I didn't realize was that the Chromebook ties in to my google account and synchronizes the state of the device, so were I do destroy this device and need to replace it, I wouldn't even need to do any data migration or reconfiguring from the damaged device.I was no expecting a laptop level experience from this device.  I have had lots of fun and frustration trying to get this device to do things it is not currently designed to do.  The fact that I can run this device in "developer mode" and I get a no-kidding bash shell with ssh allows me to forgive all the quirkiness of the platform that Google brings in the effort to make this a super secure mobile user platform.  Chromebook is Linux (hardened Gentoo, I believe), but if you don't really know Linux that deeply then you may have a hard time getting it to do what you want if you just want a Linux box.But hey, if you do just want a Linux box, there are plenty of guides out there for how to flip this thing to an Ubuntu or Debian install, either installing on a separate SD card or on the main internal flash itself, if you're so bold.

Reviews.Title: Ridiculously convenient, surprisingly quick.
Reviews.Author: Sfarnz
Reviews.Content: The only thing i have to complain about is that the 3g does not work reliably. Thankfully i can use my phone as a hot spot and this is enough for the chromebook. Other than that... I LOVE IT!!!!!I thought because the low ram that it would be sluggish... But this is absolutely not true. Its as quick, if not quicker, than my dell laptop and apple mac mini.

Reviews.Title: Product performs as described
Reviews.Author: Tina McNeil "khristyp"
Reviews.Content: I like the feel of the keyboard.  The touchpad takes alittle getting used to.  Working on the browser is different then using a windows pc and having to learn how to use different programs.  For the price and using for social networking, email or website research, even watching Netflix movies this seems like a pretty good machine for the money.  I am sure there is more that I haven't discovered yet to make this little machine even more fun to use.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I received this chromebook as a gift after my other lap top bit the dust. The chromebook was extremely easy to set up and learn to operate.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Phyllis J. Theisler
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Chromebook is light, but sturdy.  It has everything I need to surf the web, visit on Facebook or play games.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product!
Reviews.Author: Yasmina Antcliff "Yaz"
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop. The chrome book is really light, just like an imac, but at a much better price. The one thing that is important to keep in mind - this computer is fairly useless without internet access. This doesn't come with any word processing apps installed - it's set up to use the google documents apps. I just need this to surf the web and take notes at school, so for my purposes it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: This is hands down the best laptop for casual use
Reviews.Author: Rahul Pawa
Reviews.Content: Pros:* lightweight* durable (my kid has dropped it off the couch armrest several times on to hard floor and at the worst I just had to click the snap-on clips closed again)* long battery life (about 8-9 hours on a full charge even though it's about 3 months old)* instant on (it really does boot up in about 8 seconds from off, or less than 1 second from sleep)* free updates (Google updates Chrome to a new version about every 6 weeks, this frequently includes new features)* As a bonus, this computer also comes with 12 free uses of Gogo in-flight wifi, that was really easy to set up and use while in flight, just don't expect to watch Netflix during your flight. In-flight wifi in general is too slow for anything besides checking e-mail, facebook and reading articles. The passes do expire after 2 years, I probably won't get full use out of mine.Things to keep in mind:Storage space is limited with this device because it relies heavily on Google's cloud services (Google Docs, Google Drive, Google Music, etc.)Don't expect to do any heavy computer work on this device. You can't install Office on this, or video/photo/music editing software, or computer programming development environments, etc. Instead of Office, you can use Google Docs for document/spreadsheet/presentation editing. I think Google Docs is excellent for my personal needs, but there will be a learning curve for anyone used to Office.In conclusion, I would still recommend this laptop for home use even if it were double the price. The bottom line is, at $250 everyone should own at least one of these devices.

Reviews.Title: Unfortunate Purchase
Reviews.Author: AMurphy
Reviews.Content: Great idea, great price, great spec. I purchased this for my mother as a gift, so that we could keep in touch via Skype.Well, Skype is not supported on it, be warned. Not sure if there is a plan to support it, Microsoft and Google have their heads buried in the sand on this one apparently.I guess I could teach my mother google hangouts - what is it, only 10,000 hours needed to master something?

Reviews.Title: good for internet only
Reviews.Author: V-Stromer
Reviews.Content: the most basic computer I have seen. Great price which is why it got the 3 starsI purchased a couple for my employees to do some basic internet work with these. Good for basic browsing and such but limited otherwise.

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: If you want portability,  long battery life, and versatility,  then the chromebook is for you. Coupled with Google apps there is no need for software or a huge hard drive. Use the cloud for all storage needs.

Reviews.Title: Just right for me!!
Reviews.Author: Peeps
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Chromebook laptop after much consideration and reading reviews of others. I normally hate giving feedback or reviews of anything. This purchase, however, so impressed me that I felt compelled to give it proper praise.If you read the other reviews and understand the limitations of a cloud based system, and know what you are getting into, you can't go wrong with this for the price.I was a little disappointed at first because I missed my Microsoft Excel, but after a little trial and error research, I realized that MSN's Sky Drive has a full cloud based suite of office applications that worked fine once I figured out how to access and attach them to e-mails. This is the only computer I use now.I do love it.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Great
Reviews.Author: Emad Keen
Reviews.Content: Great start up timeSimple to useMy wife loves it and so do I when looking to get on the web really quick.  I can jump online and be done with the search in the same time my PC loads the OS.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding!
Reviews.Author: jpell1221
Reviews.Content: The Google Chromebook fits my needs of a quick, mobile, and cheep(price) laptop. Not only is the design of the Chromebook simple yet still sharp, but it is wicked fast turning off and on--just with a flip of the screen down, its off. Great Job Google and Samsung!For all the one star reviews about this laptop ranting about how this laptop 'sucks' for gaming, well come now, they surley did not read any of the description or know anything about the computer.Worth every penny I paid.

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what I need for a great price.
Reviews.Author: Adam C. Redmann "Boom"
Reviews.Content: It's an inexpensive computer that works perfectly for browsing the web.  I use it when I'm not wanting to sit at my desktop and I have encountered no problems with it over the first few days.

Reviews.Title: not much for volume
Reviews.Author: Denise Breitung
Reviews.Content: Other than the volume is too low, I love the size, the weight, the appearance and the speed contribute greatly.

Reviews.Title: Chrome Notebook
Reviews.Author: riveraleh
Reviews.Content: Excellent, light weight, and has all necessary essentials and  is especially good for any high schooler. I love that it signs into one's google account immediately.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little laptop
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a replacement to my Sony Vaio since it finally had died on me. This is little laptop is great! The OS is a little confusing at first coming from a Windows but it's very easy to great use to. The battery life is great and this little guy is very energy efficient. I only needed this computer to surf the web and watch a few videos.  The only con of this computer is the lack of storage. You only get 16MB stored on the Chromebook itself and you get 100MB of online storage free. So in other words no iTunes :( This computer is great though despite it's one flaw. For $230, there is NOTHING that can stand close to this in value. On one last note I feel this would be great for any college student on a budget. It's extremely easy to haul around and very light. The online storage would be great for notes, projects, etc. The only other option than this would be to get a used computer (which I feel extremely uncomfortable with) or an entry level PC laptop which they usually tend to start around $400 and aren't very good. The only thing I'm not sure about is how long the computer itself lasts but fingers crossed. It's worth trying out, I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for casual users -- like my wife  ;o)
Reviews.Author: CRAIG F
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife to use primarily for gmail and web browsing. Only hassle is that applications (such as security) must be usable or downloadable from the web.If you've got a Google account, you're up and running in no time at all.Still checking battery issues -- you'll need to click on the on-screen "shut down" button or the battery can get drained (sleep mode?)

Reviews.Title: This Chromebook is great
Reviews.Author: PamS
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Chromebook is a solid device at an affordable price. The keyboard feature makes the transition from PC to Mobile computing much easier.

Reviews.Title: Google Chromebook
Reviews.Author: T. "Twine"
Reviews.Content: If you realize the OS is just google and that's what you're looking for then you'll really enjoy this. Start up time is execellent and price is not bar behind that. Worth it!

Reviews.Title: Samsung cut corners in touchpad design
Reviews.Author: AW
Reviews.Content: This is an OK product for its price. Its battery is good (but does not last as much as they promise). Due to google cloud storage you do not miss hard disk (though it gets very expensive after a point).My biggest complain is about the invisible button on the touch pad. You can click on the lower half of the touch pad to "left click". But in this product the button gets stuck. So it is as good as you are clicking and holding it down for a very very long time. Some times it does not come back unless you click a second time. I have three of these devices and ALL of them have the problem. So they probably have whole batch of faulty devices out there.Another problem with the touch pad is its ability to detect multi-touch. I have noticed that a lot of times it fails to detect multi-touch and you end up "left clicking" when you intend to write click. Samsung is trying to copy Apple Macs by providing only left click, but they need to realize that if they need to do a good job of it. A lot of people will prefer to have two separate buttons instead of one so it is ok to stick to old fashioned design.Another very serious flaw is that this device is UNACCEPTABLY (I cannot emphasize it more) slow when browsing pictures from my camera (connected via USB). It may be the software or the hardware, I do not know. But my 6 year old Toshiba laptop does a much better job of it.But it is a perfect device for people whose primary computing needs are email/facebook/netflix. Google docs is a really nice no-cost option for MS office if you are not an advanced/pro user. It serves me well for my basic spreadsheet and word-processor needs. What I truly miss is the Skype App. Wish Microsoft releases it soon.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Stephen  Luttrell
Reviews.Content: Not much to say, the Chromebook does just what was stated in the description. I really like it and plan on buying my wife one soon.

Reviews.Title: Great product; excellent value!
Reviews.Author: geodeveloper
Reviews.Content: I was looking for another laptop since I threw my old HP against the wall for transgressions I could no longer abide. An event I'm not particularly proud of, but I did get a few moments of exultation. Anyways, I bought a superfast Dell, desk top from Costco that came with a brilliant monitor in the package. I was finishing my thesis and needed what the machine offered. Alas, I still needed a lappy for transport-ability issues. I picked up a Samsung pad, but really couldn't write on the interface. Low and behold, I saw an ad for the Chrome Book and thought I'd give it a go.Needless to say, it's been exactly what I need WITH THE EXCEPTION that I have extensive Microsoft Office suite files (ppt, word, excel) that are not supported by the Chrome OS. I could buy the latest MS Office software, but I'm going to see what the options are first.Otherwise, I've only had one recent moment where the CB didn't boot (for unknown reasons), in Mammoth Lakes, California. The CB is light, fast and very capable. Storing things in the cloud instead of on the machine's hard drive is a comparatively new option for me, but I'm working up the learning curve and enjoying the technology.So...I'm "all in" with the CB, and encourage others who are looking for a new notebook machine to give it a try. Can't beat the functionality for the price. Really!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: P. McMilian
Reviews.Content: The product condition description was accurate; the entire transaction - product condition , packaging, shipping exceeded my expectations. This Samsung Chromebook is a quality product. It is easy to set up and a great size for travel or movement around the house or office, yet not too small. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: R Campbell
Reviews.Content: I dont like the mouse pad, it is difficult to use sometimes, tricky to get it to aim at what you want to click on. It is very very basic, you cant do much on it other than surfing the internet. I like my samsung galaxy tab much better.

Reviews.Title: Just so-so.
Reviews.Author: wpgreenburg
Reviews.Content: I like how light it is, but I'm already having slow-down problems after only 3 months.  The accompanying owner's manual is inadequate.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Eric B Bellis
Reviews.Content: This chromebook is very light, which is one of the primary reasons why I purchased it. The overall layout and feel is good enough. My complains are mostly directed towards the chromeOS as there are a few limitations that you cannot use it for. The most prevalent issue would be the lack of compatibility with .mkv files. There is a list of supported file types here: http://support.google.com/chromeos/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer;=183093I highly recommend viewing this before making a final decision.Another issue I encountered was not being able to use microsoft silverlight on it. Not a huge issue as it's being phased out, but a slight inconvenience for me right now.

Reviews.Title: Great secondary PC!
Reviews.Author: Charles W. Church "meanchase"
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Chromebook so that I would have an easy device to take with me as I travel for graduate school and attempt to stay connected with work. I currently have a 17.1" laptop that I had been using but the weight and size made traveling and using it annoying. While sitting in a meeting I talked with somebody who was using a Chromebook and thought that this might be my solution. I had tried an ipad and other tablets but the onscreen keyboard and/or using a keyboard accessory was not a perfect solution because writing papers and taking notes required too many steps (plug in keybaord, switching between apps while multi-tasking between research/ writing, and finding a place to store my work that would be accessible by my PC/Laptop later). I have owned the Chromebook for about 3 weeks now and can say that this was the BEST solution for my situation, not perfect but best.Why it worked for me:- Instant on: The Chromebook is ready to run and go right away (like a tablet)- Good keyboard: Its keyboard is sufficient and easy to use (like a PC)- No distractions: I am not distracted by updating or unnecessary tasks because this is almost completely a cloud experience- Compact and light: Easily fits in my bag without. No need to buy a special bag to carry this around with you.- Great battery life: I sit in class on weekends for 6 hours or more, when fully charged my chromebook has lasted.- Easy to use: Chrome OS is simple- Connected: Chrome OS connects really well with my laptop and work PCThings I didn't like:- Its painted, I pull this in and out of my bag because of that the outside of the Chromebook has ugly scratches. I am not a fan of adding cases to my devices to protect their finish.- The screen is good, but I would have like something a bit brighter.Other things to know:- if you dont have wifi available or a hotspot you may be limited with what you can do. Google docs and such are available offline but work best when you are connected.- This is a SECONDARY device. This is not a replacement for your PC or laptop, but rather a way to become more mobile. IF you are considering this for your primary then you should expect to work mostly in cloud storage and know that certain things like gaming, photoshoping, etc can be done but not as easily or well done on a PC.- The price is great! I have lost devices before due to theft, damage, and disorganization. Although I would not throw $250 away in the trash, I am not as worried about this device as I would have been if I has bought a new laptop like a Macbook Air or an expensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: A little different
Reviews.Author: D. Stephens
Reviews.Content: My aging netbook was on its last leg so while trying to find a new laptop to buy I ran across Chromebook.  I do most of my normal computing on a desktop.  For my mobile needs, I just need access to my files and a web browser.  After reading about chromebook, it looked like it would be perfect for me.I love everything there is about this computer except for a few things.. First off, the build quality is amazing for the price.. It feels much sturdier than my netbook..  I also like the size of the device slightly better than the netbook.. I like SMALL laptops which is the reason I loved netbooks.. This laptop is slightly larger than a netbook but not big.I have read a lot of reviews talking about the screen quality.  I for one have not had a problem with screen quality.  Coming from a netbook, this screen is MUCH MUCH better..I have read other reviews speaking about the speed.. Again, coming from a netbook, this is a big improvement.  With that being said I have had no speed problems.  It runs fast, and can handle several tabs open at once.  I no longer dread loading up the laptop now..3G is great and I love the internet options.  The 100 free MB is mostly all I use but I love being able to purchase more monthly without a Verizon account..  I just purchase it when and if I need it!There are however a few problems.1.) I need access to Sheets..  There is no offline access to sheets at the time of this review.  This is the reason I purchased the 3g version..  The 100 MB of free internet is plenty to edit sheets while on the go.  I only purchase extra internet if I need to. I hope in the future I can have access to my sheets offline2.) Printing takes a little work and gone are the days of plugging your laptop into any printer and finding the driver. I hate the printing on the chromebook.. You basically have to print through the "cloud" using another computer in your home.  This works great if you are at home but I travel with a printer sometimes.  I will have to purchase a cloud printer now

Reviews.Title: wow!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Watson
Reviews.Content: I am not the brightest at setting up electronics, but this was so easy even a caveman can do it as long as you have a google account. The hardest thing to do was find my password to my wifi address. This is a great computer, has all kinds of apps for small businesses. Definitely recommend this!!

Reviews.Title: INSTANT ON
Reviews.Author: Granite
Reviews.Content: I love this. I used my laptop mostly for e mail and to surf the web.I love the Chromebook. Open the lid and you are instantly connected.Ii is lightweight. I have two laptops and a tablet. I use this about 99 % of the time.No more paying for anti-virus, anti- spyware, registry cleaners,and other things I needed to keep Windows working..I have paid more for anti-virus and anti-spyware, than I paid for the Chromebook.I wish this was available years ago.

Reviews.Title: Best $250 computer ever
Reviews.Author: JJ350
Reviews.Content: Simply put anything that I would have to say about this computer is almost rendered irrelevant due to the $250 price tag. At $250 for a brand new fully functional laptop with no moving parts and an OS, this computer is simply unrivaled. Arguably the price is the entire reason you would purchase this computer. Basically, if you want a nice little netbook that you are for the most part only going to browse the web with look no further, it's hard to have any regrets when you're only paying $250 for a laptop. As for how it works, it works well. It loads up pages quickly, you can stream HD video, and you can even hook it up to your HDTV through it's HDMI port on the back! The HDMI feature worked well when I used it for streaming video so this basically fills that niche for a nice little multi-media web browser.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: nv
Reviews.Content: This is a great value proposition if you understand what you are buying.  I would urge you to check out Google Chrome and Chromebooks online before you buy.  Alot of negative feedback seems to come from people who didn't fully understand what they were buying.Personally I have accepted that I will rarely use a computer offline again.  So this works well for me.  If you are into online MMORTS, etc.. you may want to spring for the Samsung Chromebook Series 5, as this model will lag a bit at times.  Otherwise it surfs the net just fine.As with Macs, the only significant drawback this has for me is the lack of a solid Personal Financial Management application (i.e. Quicken).  Cut rate knockoffs are available and will suffice for some (but didn't for me).

Reviews.Title: Samsung chrome book
Reviews.Author: John A. Tunstall Jr.
Reviews.Content: Unit is light and compact but screen quality is poor.A sharper and brighter screen would give Samsung a better product to sell.You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: I simply love it
Reviews.Author: sharon Hennessy
Reviews.Content: It makes my searchs facebooking email so easy its fast and lets me no what and what not to do, Ive recommended it to several peopl

Reviews.Title: I love everything about the chromebook
Reviews.Author: Antonio V.
Reviews.Content: i would recommend this to a 1st time laptop buyer, for a student and your kids 1st laptop, there's so many safe ways for kids to use and to monitor.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: william lehto
Reviews.Content: Rare nowadays is a product that performs as advertised, no more, no less.  The Chromebook meets all my needs without extra  bells and whistles.  A good example of less being more.

Reviews.Title: Hubby loves it!
Reviews.Author: Patty Riehl
Reviews.Content: I bought this Chromebook for my husbands birthday.  He used his old laptop for surfing the web, shopping online and listening to you tube videos.  He loves, loves, loves this computer!  It is small but the key board is large enough for his extra large hands.  It boots up in seconds.  Easy to use, worth every penny!!  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!
Reviews.Author: Donald Holmes
Reviews.Content: Great little laptop!!! Fast easy to use,small enough to take anywhere.I like the apps you can download,would recommend this laptop to anyone who just likes surfing the net!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Ben Schoon
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best purchases i have ever made. The only thing i've ever bought that was better was my Nexus 7. This device performs well and is currently my primary computer. Great school computer for taking notes, doing assignments, and watching videos. I use it alot for Netflix (which now does work on it).If you buy this laptop you will not regret it!!!

Reviews.Title: C
Reviews.Author: Fleabee
Reviews.Content: The description defines the notebook. I've had no issue with the Chromebook. Its compact and convienient to carry when traveling. Very light and easy to

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Valerie Brook
Reviews.Content: The Chromebook is perfect for work! So light and portable. The format is easy to learn.I can even play some games on it.

Reviews.Title: Very fast and simple
Reviews.Author: Andy McCullough
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 68 year old mom and works fast and simple for her.  Am an apple user and very impressed with this machine.  Purchased a high end Dell CAD laptop for $1700 for an employee last year and it stinks.  Surprised these chromebooks don't get more press and promotion.  Is very good.

Reviews.Title: I'm so pleased with the Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Maffia
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my husband.  He didn't try it as it is a different operating system that he is used to.  I took it on vacation with me and now I am completely familiar with it.  It's terrific.  So light weight.  Works like your android phone but with much more capabilities.  Good word processing app.  Good spreadsheet app.  Much much faster searching than my Dell laptop,  I just love this computer!  The storage is in the clouds so no security problems.  For the price, it is a steel!

Reviews.Title: Love love love it
Reviews.Author: C. Baysa
Reviews.Content: The only thing that I don't love about it is that it requires Internet no matter what you're doing. I'd want to check out calendar and I have to get Internet because its on Google Calendars. It's really annoying. The only thing that doesn't need Internet is the calculator. Also another downside is the limited apps for it. Otherwise, it's a great computer to do simple stuff.

Reviews.Title: Amazing value.
Reviews.Author: Sean Coates
Reviews.Content: Sure, the construction is pretty cheap, and I wouldn't expect it to hold up to rough treatment.  But you get a ton of functionality out of a low-cost notebook.  And by moving everything to cloud-based services, you can never lose data if the notebook is lost.  Also, you can pick up your work in progress on other workstations.  It's a great idea.

Reviews.Title: Good device at a good price
Reviews.Author: dmpain
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife after her old Windows Vista laptop died. This thing is really lightweight, thin and attractive. The screen is bright and clear and the keyboard is nice and responsive. The battery life isn't amazing, but in my experience it does last the advertised 6.5 hours or more depending on what you are doing. It's extremely fast to boot up and resume from sleep. My only real complaint is the low quality speakers. They sound very tinny especially on the high notes.My wife is a light user and she loves it. She uses it mostly for basic web surfing and watching Netflix. There are of course a few limitations that many others have pointed out, but if you know what you getting it is a great device at a really nice price.

Reviews.Title: Decent little tech as you save up for something better for your early teen
Reviews.Author: Papagood
Reviews.Content: I bought this chromebook knowing what I was getting in to; small piece of tech so that the early teenage boy can spend hours watching youtube videos and quick facebook chatting, etc.It is a very nice look piece of equipment (of course, they took the aesthetics from Apple!!) My early teen needed something to hold him over because I was tired of him borrowing mom's laptop (which I paid good money for) to play sub-par video games and watching videos. Since I knew this is exactly what he would do with any piece of tech in his hand, I figured I can use one of these to make him feel special at the same time have something a little portable at a decent price and leave mom's laptop alone (win, win and win).It has the macbook look and feel (for a fraction of the price) decent screen resolution and very good battery life.  The cons outweigh the pros by a landslide unfortunately.  These are my personal cons so its up to how the user sees fit, so don't get offended by my review.  Here goes....the thing is slow, the 16gb of soldered, unexpandable memory is a no, it lags tremendously with even short youtube clips where you would have to refresh the page often or reboot even though there is hardly anything loaded on the thing.  It has a hard time reading files form a usb stick even if it is at a recognizable format (videos especially, no matter how many times compressed, re-converted or chromebook friendly the video may be) but the worst part in my book which I really thought was a disappointment...the lack of apps in the chromebook app store by google.  My goodness you would at least think that since these are the same people behind android and the fact that the chromebook is not as powerful as a newer android phone, that google would have a lot of the apps that do not require much processing power to operate.  Such as certain media players that are great with older android phones which are slow. All in all, its not windows, its not OS X, its not android and its not iOS.  Honestly folks for the price I paid, its not bad, but it is a disappointment because for the same price I could have bought a galaxy note and that thing would have done so much more.A side not, google docs isn't as great on this as it is on a web browser.

Reviews.Title: Light & Great
Reviews.Author: Lindsay Centofonti
Reviews.Content: I have had so many laptops over the years, but this Chromebook by far blows all my computer out of the water! It's so great, user friendly, light weight & fast. I love that I can carry it around with the tip of my fingers! The battery life is great, and the wallpaper options are awesome. My girlfriend has a Mac and she is very jealous of my new Chromebook. I often brag about how amazing it is...

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby
Reviews.Author: G. David Gilliam
Reviews.Content: I picked one of these up yesterday and am using it to type this review. So far, I have been pretty pleased being a tablet/laptop user and not really apart of the cloud scene.First of all, the keyboard is outstanding. It is much easier to use than most laptop keyboards and much easier than touch screen alternatives (obviously). The keys are placed where they should be, are not cramped and have a very nice feel to them. Pretty awesome.Connectivity has been excellent with very little lag. I would call that a non-issue if you have a decent internet connection.The screen, as others have said, could be better. I realize this was only $249 so I have to cut it some slack. Still, it's the one niggling thing I have run into. I hope I can get used to it as the rest of the machine has a lot to offer.I would tell buyers to go for it and keep the receipt in case the screen is not something you are willing to budge on. It's not awful be any means but it nowhere near as clear as my Note 2 and Moto Xoom. Maybe I'm just spoiled:)On a side note, many of the one star reviews here are not really fair. Many of them are from people who bought something without any research at all. This is not a Windows or Mac clone for a low price.

Reviews.Title: does just what it says it does
Reviews.Author: Chris Acevedo
Reviews.Content: bought this for my son after his laptop battery fried.  no moving parts, stays cool.  fast enough.  he does homework, saves to google docs or his school's share drive, listens to music, watches netflix and amazon instant.  Think, looks cool....cost and more than aceptable functionality make this a good solution for the right person.

Reviews.Title: perfect for casual use & on-the-go browsing
Reviews.Author: Loren Chandler
Reviews.Content: i did a lot of research on these bad boys before purchasing my chromebook, and i must say the research i did pretty much covers how i feel about the machine so far. it's super lightweight, small enough to carry but big enough to feel substantial, and has more ports than some top-line laptops. that's the thing you've got to keep in mind, though; this is not a laptop. it's a tablet with a keyboard and track-pad (mouse). in that sense, i feel like it's perfect for anyone who needs an easily portable device for casual web browsing and word processing. since i'm starting school soon i decided to go in for this, purely for note-taking during class and access to online campus services/class materials. it has very, very little internal memory but a bunch of cloud storage, which is just as safe (if not safer) and reliable as anything on a hardrive.i've had a few bugs and weird glitches, but they're minor and easily remedied with a quick restart. also, it's worth mentioning that the boot time is hilariously fast, which makes this problem all the more insignificant.as far as negatives go, there is a bit of strangeness when it comes to connecting to the internet. obviously, since this is a web-based device, that's not a good thing. i've had issues with connecting to perfectly strong, unprotected wifi signals that should have let me right in. instead, the chromebook will take several minutes to... i don't know what, it just takes too long. also, the layout of the interface is a bit hard to get used to, but that's less of a drawback than a small learning curve.overall, mobile users/students/travelers should snatch this up if they're considering this over a much more expensive laptop.**in addition, make sure to buy the EEEKit for Samsung Chromebook Series 5, the one with the soft sleeve, headphones, etc. everything that comes with it is well worth the $11 or whatever and it's a high quality product, especially the sleeve and the headphones.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal As Long As You Know What You're Getting
Reviews.Author: Dallas Grantham
Reviews.Content: For $250 this is a steal. As long as you know exactly what you can do and what you're limits are, this is one of the best things money can buy. Do your research before buying so that you won't be disappointed if you want to do things that Chrome OS currently doesn't support.Fast, light, and simple. It's crazy that some MP3 players cost this much.

Reviews.Title: chromebook
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: i love this purchase....it was a little smaller than i expected ..butt i was so excited to get it i never look at the size..just love the features of the chrome book  ..great camera ...great look ...its just like advertised...only thing i cant get skype ...facebook and all other apps work great

Reviews.Title: Easy access to the internet
Reviews.Author: UsetoRepo
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the primary purpose of accessing the internet while on the road.  I like the fact that it automatically searches out wireless internet connections as soon as you open the cover.  It has many other capabilities that I have yet to look into but I love it for the size and convenience as it is much easier to travel with than a big laptop.

Reviews.Title: I love my Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Blair A. Russell
Reviews.Content: I'll start by saying yes there are a few things I miss, lack of functionality with some Microsoft products, and less computing power, but once you get over those things you will find a really nice piece of hardware for a really amazing price. I've had my Chromebook for 5 months now and it has been great for traveling, bringing to work, or even just throwing in the car to take around town. The screen is a great quality for me and allows me to watch Netflix and other movies with no noticeable degrade in quality. The keyboard is very tactile, the camera is also great for cam chatting. It is very light, and loads up really quickly so definitely good for someone who is on the go, not to mention the battery last a surprisingly long time. If you just use your computer for browsing and occasionally processing then invest in a Chromebook.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for school
Reviews.Author: Jason Ryan Smith
Reviews.Content: Very pleased my new machine, and I recommend getting the EEEkit advertised along with the Chromebook.  Literally no learning curve with the Chromebook.  Connected to my home network immediately and had a concise tutorial upon startup.  Glad to be moving almost entirely to the cloud.  Got this for use during my full-time MBA.  I'll leave my windows machine at home and do Wake-on-Lan and RDP for accessing my statistical software.  Subtract the $120 of free 100 GB storage and the cost is $130.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Rolando Alvarado
Reviews.Content: its really awesome and i would buy it again. I am writing this review with the chromebook and its awesome just the only negative is it seems cheap holding it but dont let that mislead you it works WONDERs

Reviews.Title: Small screen is tough to get used to
Reviews.Author: B. Shea
Reviews.Content: I held off getting one of these Chromebooks, waiting to see if the concept of a simple 'browser based' computer would catch on.As I heard of a few friends getting one, I decided to give it a shot with this Chromebook, going for the cheaper 11.6 inch.I forgot how much I have gotten used to my larger hi-res notebook screens. The small screen takes some getting used to, and it is certainly not something to 'work' with. But it's great for doing most of your web stuff... email, reading, video, music. The sound is very good considering how tiny and light this thing is.I would probably get the larger screen next time, but for now this is the perfect device to leisurely browse the web and check social sites (even shop) while relaxing outside or on the couch. Battery life is very good, startup is very quick, and overall a great experience for those not needing much.It might take a while to get used to the trackpad, and the slightly different key configuration (no buttons for trackpad, no delete or capslock or page up/down for keyboard) but remember what this notebook is for...  simple stuff at a simple price.Why only 4 stars? I just didn't want to say it was the greatest thing in the world. It has it's limitations, AS designed. If you are looking for something that is just for email and browsing, and maybe watching netflix, this thing is great. It might be a great gift for someone you want online, but remember the size of the screen if getting for some older people that refuse to wear glasses. :)

Reviews.Title: The super fast computer.
Reviews.Author: Bernett Francis
Reviews.Content: It is very convenient light and great for travel. My only problem was no Skype video. But the picture is very clean and fresh. Great apps. And booths up in a zip.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook perfect for what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Kathye
Reviews.Content: I ordered one of these for my son, who works out of state and needed a way to communicate at odd times - and that worked out so well I got another one for myself and one for a friend who is in an extended-living facility.  Perfect!  The only issues any of us have had is getting used to Chrome OS - but there are tutorials and many available (and free!) apps that make it quite wonderful!

Reviews.Title: love this computer!
Reviews.Author: A. Rehnblom
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer as an alternative to buying a fully loaded Ultrabook or thinner laptop.  For the price point and what I needed it for, this can't be beat.  It's super fast and boots up in seconds.  The maintenance is low because it automatically updates itself and tells you when a new update needs to be installed.  While it would be nice to have Microsoft Office on here, I can do everything I need for school through Google Docs.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone who just needs a computer for basic school work and/or browsing the internet.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Sandeep Mannur
Reviews.Content: Nice, well organized and solidly built. Just as advertised, and perfect for home use with Google Drive.  I love that there are no viruses and spyware to worry about nor Microsoft Office Suite to purchase.

Reviews.Title: This is a very functional laptop
Reviews.Author: Chris Lewis
Reviews.Content: As long as you're willing to use Google as your login (GMail, Google Drive, etc.)... but you know what you're getting into when you start... I agree with previous reviewers that the only thing to watch out for is the VERY small power connector... several reviewers said that it had broken and needed replacement.

Reviews.Title: great for what its capable
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: For the price, a mobile, sleek, powerful browser, and great variety of google services, this is a steal! boots up in a matter of seconds, the battery life is more than enough, and while the keyboard may be a tacky version of the macbook, it serves its purpose well. I love th filters on the webcam and the portability the most. And as a college student, this is great for note taking and presentations on the go! I hooked it up to my tv with the hdmi cable and have a wireless mouse and keyboard to complement the chromebook. Even the sound quality isnt bad at all, don't expect amazing bose surround sound, but it gets loud. I do wish that the speakers were not on the bottom the computer so it gets clouded when its on your lap and covers the speakers, but It's a great investment by any means

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: Amberly Kaye Johannespurvis "A. Purvis"
Reviews.Content: It is so much better than I expected. It turns on and off really fast and is great for home schooling. It has all the programs I need loaded to it and is so easy to use my little one can use it.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use, I haven't used my PC in a month
Reviews.Author: S. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: This is a great, easy to use little computer. I find that I rarely need to use anything outside of Google Docs/Sheets, and Google Chrome offers plenty. It plays Netflix videos just fine, I use spotify web app for music, internet connection is fast, and connects quickly. I haven't felt the need to turn on my PC except for once when I was having trouble edit a .docx file. It is very light, and I get about 5.5 hours of battery life on a charge. It doesn't get warm during use, and it's easy to toss around and not worry too much about. I have some scratches on it already, but for $250, I don't feel so worried compared to when I use my girlfriend's $1300 macbook. It's not the fastest machine, and the tap to click on trackpad doesn't work so well on the upper half, I prefer to push for the audible click. Keyboard is fantastic, almost as good as my gf's mac. I am typing several Amazon reviews on this right now, and it's so easy to use and reliable.

Reviews.Title: Great Birthday present for Myself
Reviews.Author: Suzanne M. Whiteside "Groovy Gramma"
Reviews.Content: The Chromebook is very fast, easy to start up and I really like Google.  It is very portable and has a very long battery life.

Reviews.Title: From A Huge Chromebook Fan!!!
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I should note this is 10 month review of daily use April 22nd 2013-February 22nd 2014all the websites i ever went to i did not run into any issuesplease note neither a external dvd/bluray will work with thischromebooks are strictly internet only computers  wifi has never dropped out not even once in 10 months!you set it up once then every time you open the lid your online instantlyas far as its operating system its really nonexistent which makes it impossibleto get viruses trojans and malware so its safe

Reviews.Title: Just what I need and nice little computer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I don't store things on my computer, I use flash drives or cloud storage methods and most people in my family are the same way. This makes the Chromebook a perfect option for us. We have a lot of electronic devices in our home between tablets, smart phones and laptops all Windows or Andriod products and many of them Samsung. I have had nothing but good experiences with Samsung products, and this little laptop is no exception.If you are looking for a mega computer with a lot of storage options and large game playing capability, this isn't for you but if you are looking for a little laptop to surf the next, play casual games and minor office abilities then this is for you.The only con for me is the inability to really use Skype. I hope they fix that soon.

Reviews.Title: seems good, does not hook up to a printer directly
Reviews.Author: D. H. Richards "ninthwavestore"
Reviews.Content: This is not a computer you get when you need a computer, if that makes sense. This is more like a terminal from the old days. It booted up really well and found the internet etc. It seems built pretty solid (the surface finish is odd, but that's just me).Our main computer, the old big box under the desk, had failed. This seemed like a reasonable replacement- we just needed a very simple computer for surfing and letter writing. But we also needed also to be able to print. I am sorry to say that this computer does NOT hook up directly to a printer. Instead it will print to a remote printer (that is, a printer on your OTHER computer or if you have a cloud printer).So we had to return it - not for us.But if you are just looking for secondary laptop this will do well.

Reviews.Title: Hard to use
Reviews.Author: boographic
Reviews.Content: You will have to adapt to always using a browser for everything. even offline apps are browser based. You will have to rethink everything you know about regular computers and become proficient with the web to use this with ease.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Great for a teen. Great price!!!!!!!! My daughter loves it for music, and homework. Speakers could be better quality. Overall good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Gleerflan "Richard"
Reviews.Content: It's lightweight, speedy, and functional--as long as you don't need to run Photoshop or some other comparable productivity program. To my taste, the display seems a bit washed out, but otherwise acceptable. The "i" key sticks, and the the touchpad occasionally drifts slightly. However, it accepts a wireless mouse, and I have learned to hit the "i" a bit harder than the other keys. It does everything I need, and you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: OSUChick
Reviews.Content: This little book is so handy.  I love how quickly it powers up and how the internet is so fast on it.

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: Christian Valdivia
Reviews.Content: i received this product earlier than i expected which was great. everything about this product works great. the only flaw that i have seen is that some youtube videos do not play on my computer. i dont know if its my internet connection or something else. hopefully its only a temporary annoyance.other than that very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Footo
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my chromebook. I am not a "computer" guy just a regular user who surfs the web and creates documents. What I would recommend is using Google Docs if you are a Word user. Also install Google Chrome on your current device. Then the other throwback is there is not a delete button and the inability to copy/paste just using the right click. You have to use the control button. But after using for over a month this has become second nature. There are so many more pluses than negatives and the negatives are just adjusting. I would say go for it if your thinking of it. Plus are the making you use Google Drive thus can use anywhere, the storage of documents is in the cloud harder to use, password storage, the ease to carry, no virus needed, quick bootup,battery life, the whole Google system is cool, plus more. As anything it takes getting used to. I had for over a month and enjoy my chromebook.

Reviews.Title: For $250 it's unbeatable
Reviews.Author: P. Gaitens
Reviews.Content: For basic PC functions the Chromebook is a winner. Fast start-up, fast shutdown, light, great keyboard, easy to use.I use it for web surfing, video viewing, email and simple word processing.For the price, this device has no peers.

Reviews.Title: Received early and has been working for the wife with no issues
Reviews.Author: Richard N. Sutliff
Reviews.Content: got Chromebook for wife so she could do her facebook and games. the notebook has been excellent for her, no lockups or slow response - which drives her crazy. She loves her new toy.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A Hyde
Reviews.Content: I use linux all the time but I really love this one, don't have to worry about anything just sign to your Google account and everything is there. It is really fast , I have 3 laptops and this is the one I use all the time

Reviews.Title: LOVE the Chromebook!!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Sears "Shopping Mimi"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter's 16th Birthday!  It is absolutely fantastic, does everything she needs it to do!  Lightweight, speedy, nice keyboard and design!  Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me, but not for everybody.
Reviews.Author: helloitsmeeric "Eric"
Reviews.Content: This laptop is amazing for me, I wanted an inexpensive, capable, portable notebook for homework, presentations, YouTube, and Google services, and this computer more than delivers. I had read on several reviews about people complaining about the build quality of this device, but I have found that it feels and much better and stronger than most reviews credited it.Is this laptop for you?If you:- Browse the internet- Watch YouTube videos- Create papers- Create presentations- Edit photos- Edit very very basic videos- Browse and manage local files- Play quick fix gamesAND are willing to be flexible and excepting to new ways of doing these things,yes! I would defiantly recommend this computer to you!The performance of this notebook seems very very great, and I can run around 20 tabs without the browser slowing down.This is great for me! I would defiantly recommend trying it out in a in real life before you purchase though.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: gk
Reviews.Content: Very clean, easy to use, functional. Although it's internet only use, I expected as much, as it's been very convenient for quick internet browsing and work.

Reviews.Title: Gift to a friend
Reviews.Author: nancy geiser
Reviews.Content: I ordered this computer for a young girl who is in college.She is very happy with it. I hope she will graduate in three years.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook is a great light, small travel buddy
Reviews.Author: Michael T "Michael T"
Reviews.Content: I love the chromebook for travel - it's small, it's light, and it's got a very nice keyboard so I can actually type long email messages or other documents while traveling for business.When I'm traveling I don't need a whole lot of storage - enough of my life has moved to the cloud that I can do all my travel essentials on a chromebook that are unwieldy on my Android phone, and not worth lugging the poundage of a full laptop:  I can check Yelp for restaurants and book on OpenTable or UrbanSpoon, I can check all my travel plans on TripIt, I can check work and personal email and actually respond without struggling with screen-based keyboard on my phone or tablet (Nexus 7), I can listen to my music on Google or on Pandora, I can watch streamed movies, or even downloaded ones saved either to the device or an SD card.And the price point ($249 for mine) is amazing - get one for every member of your family for the lowest priced AirBook.My Chromebook is my new, light, small travel buddyIt honestly obsoletes my old laptop - now I have to figure out what to do with that monster.

Reviews.Title: golden, but asking for a little more
Reviews.Author: Guven Peter Witteveen "outreachsci"
Reviews.Content: All features and benefits are there; also all caveats about limited offline functions. What more I ask of the maker (firmware?) is driver support for Ethernet. Some brands of chromebook *do* support USB adapters for Ethernet (usb 2 allows up to 1 gigabit/second data; usb 3 allows up to 5 gb/s). Alas the 3g model in 4/2013 does not. Also in the "I wish" category, I wish the blue-tooth connectivity (currently for mouse & full-size keyboards sold separately) would extend to direct transfer Chromebook to chromebook (and to other devices one identifies). Lastly, I have learned that the 3g model has a SIM card slot and that one can take this Chromebook to Europe and buy service on a SIM card there, month to month. The steps to "enable Global SIM card" involve manually typing a command at the CTRL+ALT+T prompt. It is too bad that Samsung and/or google don't point this out more prominently as an added feature to travelers who love this device's portability, speed and simplicity.

Reviews.Title: Simple and full functional
Reviews.Author: Arseniy Kaploun
Reviews.Content: things I missed in Chrome OS:- ability to import raw photos- skype- music player is inconvenientfull featured on hardware level:+ I liked hdmi out,+ noticed no performance issues, everything is fast and smooth- display might be better, but considering it's price...

Reviews.Title: Easy , fun and a bargain !!
Reviews.Author: Debra R. Carpenter
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with my Chromebook .  I wanted something that was easy to use for everyday web browsing and this really fit the bill .

Reviews.Title: Great purchase, bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: KRISTY DECOURSEY
Reviews.Content: I finally got one of these and LOVE it! Light, fast start up and shut down. Only draw back would be the size of the screen, but that is because the whole thing is smaller and that is what I wanted. Excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excelent! And I know it will be better!
Reviews.Author: Pablo Masis Holdridge
Reviews.Content: I buy this computer for a daily use at home.1. Is amazing how fast the computer turns on.2. The keyboard is just perfect, you can write without any problem3. Battery, AMAZING! A dream comes true, between 6 o 7 hours of normal use.4. 100gb free on Google Drive, this pay the computer.Just one bad thing, no one can install Skype. But I use IMO as substitution, you can chat trought skype on that page, but you cannot call or videocall. But it works just perfect for me.Go on, is cheap, is beautiful and works perfects!

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Ann M
Reviews.Content: When it arrived it was packaged well.  I liked the chrome finish and the size. The portability is good, fits into a large purse.

Reviews.Title: Great, Light and very elegant design
Reviews.Author: Erich Friesen
Reviews.Content: Surprised how light and functional the device is.  Much better design than Apple or other laptops, love the extra large track pad.I would use the supplied Chrome OS for a while, but could look to install a real distro (SuSE, Fedora, or Scientific GNU/Linux) sometime in near future.  Extremely quite, seems to have NO FANS or other moving parts (other than the hinge to open it) whatsoever.I would like a little more storage, but 16 gig should be enough, as long I keep track of what I need and can get web access to dropbox.

Reviews.Title: Untouchable!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Doherty
