I followed a very simple Lifehacker article to install Ubuntu alongside Chrome OS, they boot together and it works seamlessly. The solution I used is called 'Crouton' if you're interested.Excellent for casual browsing, and adding Ubuntu lets you do ALMOST anything (do not buy this for gaming, duh).If you are a linux admin, you need this or something equivalent ASAP, as it is light, mobile, and versatile enough to be used in any setting, plus the battery life is insane. I can do my job remotely as long as I'm near wifi, and if something happens to it, it was only ~$200 (If you've had $2000 laptops lost or damaged, you probably understand).Note: I chose this model of Chromebook predominantly for the weight; other models have more processing speed, but tend to be heavier. The pricepoint was also a factor.

Reviews.Title: Built like a tank even though it doesn't seem like it
Reviews.Author: Andy "sgarlic"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 6 year old daughter to use.  She has dropped it, slept on top of it, let the battery die multiple times, clicked way too hard on the mouse pad, the buttons, and anything else you could think of, and it works just great still to this day.  Battery life is really long on it too, amazingly--she hardly ever charges it and doesn't really do anything but watch youtube videos on it all day.  I would highly recommend this product for children--it's great.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just one thing about that was not 100% - my brokerage account was hardly accessible. For the rest, fantastic! Recommended for everyone who takes his/her device everywhere all the time. The 100 Gb disk space on Google drive free for two years gives you a great possibility to share your data across different devices (I use a laptop, tablet, and Chromebook)

Reviews.Title: Interresting object
Reviews.Author: Odelin Casseus
Reviews.Content: I ve made a good choice when  i get this  chromebook it is fantastic, it remaind  charges for  7 hours.

Reviews.Title: It's a totable, mini laptop!
Reviews.Author: SRK
Reviews.Content: Thank you for speedy delivery of my new Chromebook. Although it doesn't do everything that my regular laptop does, it is convenient for writing and basic internet tasks. I am able to carry it to the coffee shop or dog park without any trouble.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Kathryn A. Schroeder
Reviews.Content: Have enjoyed everything about the Samsung chromebook.  Easy to use and so light weight. Great for traveling.  Prefer this to the I-Pads. Still working on how to print out documents.

Reviews.Title: kid friendly
Reviews.Author: Tasha
Reviews.Content: Great for the kids to be able to do their homework and play games. I Love the fact that it was inexpensive so if they mess it up I'm not out of a lot of money.  Love this product for a starter computer!

Reviews.Title: Affordable and great!
Reviews.Author: cesar
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for college. Its extremely light and mobile but also does everything I need it to do. If your looking for an affordable laptop this is one of the best to get.

Reviews.Title: Gets The Job Done
Reviews.Author: dara
Reviews.Content: Im NOT a techie so all the intricacies I see in reviews of electronics you wont see here.  IT DOES WHAT I NEED IT TO DO!! If I have a question I GOOGLE IT and let those guys tell me (Lol). Getting used to the different features but it is cool. Good to learn new thing.  I use Chrome on my pc and I use it on my mobile device so having whatever I need when I need it is great. Working on documents is a little pain but that comes with anything new & im getting used to it. Its a more practical way to have everything with you. Its very light and the screen is bigger than I thought it would be. Printing is irritating but when I get a printer with cloud capabilities it won't be such a hassle. Overall I like it alot. Nothing bad to say at all.

Reviews.Title: OK internet productivity
Reviews.Author: Fred Adelman
Reviews.Content: Need a quick instant-on connection to the internet? This is the mini-notebook for you. You can't get much done productivity-wise because there is no way to install new programs (it does have one USB 2.0 & USB 3.0 port) on this Google Chrome operating system, but for a quick Chrome internet connection or some standard games (but you need an internet connection for them to work), this will do the trick. It needs some small fixes here and there (which are being addressed), but it does the trick. It is also unbelievably light.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: Thoughtful Reader "Vernon C."
Reviews.Content: I looked around a lot, because I was looking for something that was easy to use and something that was cheap.  So, I caught a special on this and saved even more than I would have if I had bought it locally.And with Prime, I didn't pay any shipping costs.My wife uses it for Facebook, email and also does some reading on it when she's not using her Kindle Fire.  It's a pretty good machine if you don't expect much.  I've found it also works well as a backup when my main computer in down.For the money, the Samsung is a good one.  Have had this since Christmas and it's almost April with absolutely no problems at all.  Was even able to set it up with my Dell printer, which is honestly pretty dated.Buy it, if you want something easy to use and aren't interested in graphics, games and such.  It's a good deal as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: travis
Reviews.Content: I use this for college mainly because it is SUPER light and it starts up quick. If I were to gripe about it however, then it would be a gripe on the google servers. The Chromebook relies entirely on the google servers for Google docs (the google version of microsoft word). If the server is down, or even slow, then it can get really frustrating when you need to find/write notes quickly in class. I would say that i have problems with google docs about 40% of the time.

Reviews.Title: I'm not sure if i purchased this product new or refurbished.
Reviews.Author: Catina Dyal
Reviews.Content: But it came on time, and it's working fine. The only problem i have is that i wish i would have picked a more up to date model, however over all, i am so far satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great price, fast, and convenient
Reviews.Author: terryb
Reviews.Content: I love the simplicity of the chromebook experience.  It is fast and easy to use, and the chrome OS keeps getting better with the addition of offline apps and desktop apps.  The experience is minimalist, and I find that keeps me focused on completing tasks.In the past, I have felt very cautious carrying around more expensive laptops and I have been concerned about the data that I might lose if my laptop was stolen.  The battery life is great.I often tether my chromebook to my phone when traveling.  I have found that I cannot tether via USB.  It seems that I have to tether using wifi.

Reviews.Title: Great for my mother
Reviews.Author: BluesKid
Reviews.Content: She loves it, as she mostly uses email, youtube, and light websurfing. Typing on a tablet is not in the cards, so this is perfect. Battery life is great too. For the price these are amazing.

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome little computer!
Reviews.Author: Alan Swank
Reviews.Content: I really love this little computer. I drag it with me everywhere. I have pcs, Air MAC, and even Raspberry.pi. I just really like my chromebook. No, it is not a power house, but it is a great internet machine. I got the free 100 gig of free Google Drive storage for two years. I plan on giving one as a graduation gift. It is great for writing college papers. It has access to Outlook.com and is compatible with Office Online. So, students can write papers in native Word format, for free.Of course the machine is optimized for Google products. It is fast and easy to use. It feels like a Mac.Buy two or three. They really are a nice machine for cruising the web and working with cloud based applications.They are not a primary computer though. Think of chromebooks as a commuter car, vs. a semi truck. They serve their purpose very well. They are an inexpensive tool to access the web.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Dan Kennedy
Reviews.Content: What a great deal! Wasn't sure about a refurbished unit but I really like it a lot !  Have had no issues what so ever

Reviews.Title: Great for internet access
Reviews.Author: Nicole DeShazer
Reviews.Content: All that this computer can do it access the Google suite : chrome, google docs, calendar, gmail, etc. So it is great for getting on the internet. Because you cannot add any programs (only google add-ons) it will never have a memory issue, so it boots up really fast. The key board is thin and I like the fact that the keys make a tiny click noise.

Reviews.Title: The best bang for your buck
Reviews.Author: scott sorensen
Reviews.Content: The Cloud storage is super great. Super fast start up. Super fast reboots. Super fast internet. Super light. Super computer.

Reviews.Title: We are really enjoying everything that this little machine does. Price almost makes it an impulse Buy :)
Reviews.Author: Small Sales Online
Reviews.Content: As long as you understand that this is a online only machine this is a great value.It's nice to have an extra screen in the living room for the kids for netflix, hulu or amazon prime video, or just handy to look things up.Excellent battery life, and size and price coupled with the HDMI port is great for travel.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook Samsung
Reviews.Author: BoKvale
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I expected, I've had it for about a month and really enjoyed it with my time available. Still have a lot of playing to do.

Reviews.Title: It is a honey.
Reviews.Author: LaVerne Silor
Reviews.Content: This is tehe best purchase I have ever made.  If I had known I may not have gotten my computer.  It works great.

Reviews.Title: Not for us
Reviews.Author: M. rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This netbook does not have the capability to shut down. So it guns the network all the time. If you have limit network it will suck the gigs.

Reviews.Title: Everyday Use
Reviews.Author: Craig M. Reed
Reviews.Content: I've ditched using a desktop or traditional Laptop in favor of my Chromebook.  Does every web service I would do before with other devices.  It's light, doesn't get warm to hold on lap. and the battery is FOREVER long.  I use this machine for hours each night and I'm still impressed with it even after a year of use.  The startup time is astounding, we're talking seconds.  Not minutes until full functioning use.  The price is another plus of course.  $250 is bargain bin price, with 5 star quality on build and performance.  Yes, you can use it off-line too for music, movies, some games, and even productivity things like word processing, and spreadsheets.  Try it out.  You won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Works for my Lifestyle
Reviews.Author: Questa
Reviews.Content: I'm a full time student and  part time worker. I was looking for something lighter than my normal laptop and I found this. I love Google Drive because it saves any changes made to my papers so I don't forget and it's automatically saved to the cloud. It also works well for work. I stay around WiFi hotspots all day so this was just want I needed. I can get online with ease and I love the fast start up and shut down time. I also like that I don't have to see those annoying update popups. Everything I need is right here in this lightweight accessible Chromebook. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: For my daughter
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who uses it for school, mostly. She is enjoying it very much and is glad I gave it to her.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop
Reviews.Author: Kim A Johnson
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this laptop. It is exactly what I was looking for especially price wise. It's light and easy to carry around. Thanks Samsung. You never let me down. I now have a laptop, tablet and S4 cell phone from Samsung and I choose them much better than the Apple products. They are just too overpriced!

Reviews.Title: a great little laptop
Reviews.Author: LeAnne Bright
Reviews.Content: I bought this mainly to access the web and it does that with ease.  Quick on/off, great apps to choose from (free) Only issue I have is the small screen.....I should have looked into a bigger chromebook.  Would be great for students.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: k
Reviews.Content: This little laptop was just perfect as a gift for my son.  It's sole purpose is for internet browsing, online media and social sites.  Thinking of getting one myself

Reviews.Title: Well above average value
Reviews.Author: Thomas Anderson
Reviews.Content: Performed exactly as advertised.  Lightweight and moderatly versitile but well work the money for those that don't need the power of a laptop( and most of us dont). Size makes it easy to whip put of your case and start working.

Reviews.Title: Great and Lightweight!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Pate "Psalm23"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 4 year old son. He loves it and carries it around the house. The battery life lasts very long and he loves it. it's so easy to navigate. Great for Wi-Fi. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: best purchase
Reviews.Author: Charity Rainville
Reviews.Content: This was hands down the best purchase we have gotten from amazon ever. We use this on a daily basis and it exceeded our expectations in what we thought we were purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Quick
Reviews.Author: Ronald Daenzer
Reviews.Content: Quick web access.No waiting / praying for Micro$oft window$ to boot up.I get instant access to my email.The price is right.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: maddy
Reviews.Content: Now really, a laptop under $300? Do I say impossible? This is so swesome that I bought two, one for each of my grandchildren. At under $300 it makes a great birthday present.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mad Inventor
Reviews.Content: Love it because it's fast working computer and there's a app store that could put every thing that you want to put and could buy every game you want

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a student who also has a desktop.
Reviews.Author: CodyS
Reviews.Content: I really love this product, I highly recommend it to anyone who already has a desktop. If you are just doing things like browsing the web, typing documents, and checking email, this device is perfect for you. If however you do anything outside of that realm, the chrome book may not be the best option for you. I bought this to supplement my computer needs at college. I needed something that was small, lightweight, affordable, and good at doing basic tasks while I am in class. Typically I use it to take notes or type an essay on the go. One thing that I love about this computer, is the battery life. I can use the chrome book all day long and not need to charge! I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good Little Gadget
Reviews.Author: Judy S
Reviews.Content: My husband isn't into computers, but occasionally needs to look things up on the internet for his work. He finds this compact enough to keep in his shop and easy to use. I like it when I have something quick I want to do on the internet and don't want to boot up my lap top. We've been very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: One of the best purchases I've made
Reviews.Author: Paul Iacono
Reviews.Content: It's a wonderful little lap top. I use it all the time. It takes a little time getting used to it, but little by little it gets easier to use.So far so good and have had no problems. The tech department for getting help: outstanding. I'm very happy with the purchase. I recommend others to have one.

Reviews.Title: great for surfing the web
Reviews.Author: Richard Mullowney III
Reviews.Content: The is a great PC for getting on the interent.  I like using a key pad and not using a touch screen.  The only thing I would like to know more about is some of the quick key function that it does.

Reviews.Title: Who knew?!
Reviews.Author: Jean Rampage
Reviews.Content: My son-in-law has one and recommended it. I love the light weight, compactness, the ease, quickness, features. Everything I need is right there.  I think it would be great no matter what your skill level.  Wish I had learned on one of these, way back when.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Erwin Goldberg
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, light, boots up fast, good battery life, no fear of virus or malware, good screen. Love it

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie S. Kenk "parroted"
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect size for my business.  Its light, extremely portable and gets the job done!  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great device, but some drawbacks...
Reviews.Author: Michael H. "mike_h_in_stl"
Reviews.Content: Great performance, light, great battery...but the touchpad went haywire after a year.  It started skipping around and trying to drag every element on the screen.Had to do a system recovery and reinstall Chrome.  As of now, it works fine again -- but I lost my saved files as I couldn't get them copied to a flash drive.  I didn't have a lot on there, but it was still aggravating.The only other performance critique would be that the speaker volume could be louder.In the future, I'll definitely make sure to upload anything on there to Google Drive, just in case.

Reviews.Title: Still works, 1+ years later
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I have two primary computers, this one and my laptop from college. I got this because of it's fast boot-up time and because I just wanted a computer to browse the internet that was small and light. I say this to preface that if you need to do serious word processing, etc. this would not be a good computer for that. But it's perfect for what I wanted it for. Although, I do still take notes on it for my grad classes.I can also testify (and the reason I waited to write my review) that the battery life lasts. Even now, it lasts for hours (I haven't looked recently), less if I'm watching netflix, which is to be expected.I highly recommend this computer if you have the correct expectations.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: SRK
Reviews.Content: Nice and compact, convenient for transporting, typing and writing. Fine with internet browsing and most standard computer needs, though I still haven't figured out where the caps locks are and how to copy and paste. Not sure if the Chrome apps design includes these features. Overall, a nice little mini laptop.

Reviews.Title: Be aware!
Reviews.Author: Wayne E. Kent
Reviews.Content: Be fully aware this is not a full fledged laptop but for every day use it is perfect. What amazed us was the speed.  It is a fast little machine. We run it off the Wi-Fi with Charter Internet which absolutely smokes. Love it!!!!! We like the Chrome browser and even switched to it on our PC.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Heath Larson
Reviews.Content: The Chromebook was as expected, like new.  Very content customer.  If you are looking for a good deal on a chromebook, here is your chance.

Reviews.Title: small but worth it
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: Will first of all I really don't much about laptops and when I seen this one it had my attention, when it came in the mail I was surprised that it was that small,but overall I truly do like it and it's easy to carry around

Reviews.Title: Graet little notebook!
Reviews.Author: Joseph T. Sowder "karenjoexxx"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these as gifts for family members, and they both love it! It is small, lightweight, easy to use, and capable of doing most things a laptop can do. It makes it easy to be on the web and not be tied down to a particular spot. No moving parts so very quiet and durable. All in all, an excellent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Tranman
Reviews.Content: Great bang for the buck! Awesome, does everything and is quick! No issues and no complaints, it's less than 250 bucks!

Reviews.Title: It's good for surfing the web, that's about it though
Reviews.Author: My Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It's good for surfing the web, that's about it though.  For the price I am satisfied. Build quality isn't as good as apple but then again it's a 1/5th of the price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung vs Acer
Reviews.Author: Dave Stanley "Find the deal"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Acer 720 for my Ex and the Samsung for myself after setting hers up for Christmas  and liking the chromebook experience. A few differences I see, The Acer has the Usb ports on the side. The Samsung on the back. Since I use the laptopo on my lap the USB Flashdrives in the back of the Samsung tend to hit my knees and bend or pop out. No problems with the Acer side ports. I had to buy a mini Sandisk 32 to leave in the back of the Samsung. So far so good.  Con-You cant easily rename the flash drive after formatting it on a chromebook."Untitled" is the new name. The  File explorer is lacking somewhat compared to windows. Maybe there is a third pty app. Another observation:the ACER is HD , Samsung no mention.Battery life on Acer seems longer. Lastly ,The Acer set up quickly on her ATT wifi, I had to call comcast help desk to get the Samsung to work. I had to reboot the Router daily and log in  on the chromebook with the comcast password, The tech changed something on the router he said chromebooks did not like.Works fine now. All in all, I  use my Windows 7 laptop infrequently nowadays.  enjoy the Chromebook experience,,I expect it will only get better.

Reviews.Title: Love the speed
Reviews.Author: Gayle L. Entz
Reviews.Content: I'm still getting used to it....sooooo fast...perfect for my needs. Haven't used the excel worksheet yet but no problems so far!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase.
Reviews.Author: Holly Morgan
Reviews.Content: This was the best purchase. Everyone in my house loves it and there is always a fight over who is going to use it next!!

Reviews.Title: Does every thing I need!
Reviews.Author: John McCaskill
Reviews.Content: I have had this chrome book (purchased from Amazon) for slightly over 1 Year!  It does take a while to get used to, however, the more I have used it the better I like it!Now, I am not a "Power User" but for the everyday functions of internet browsing, email and video watching and audio, it works just fine and is very fast.  I do, from time to time, create text and spreadsheets documents and using the "Google Drive" programs presents a bit of a challenge and  have a little steep learning curve.  On the other hand, there are tutorials for these functions and cloud printing is like magic (to me)!The only real down side is requiring internet access, however there are such a growing number of "hot Spots" that this is becoming less of a challenge and you can use Kindle readers off line  and off line Gmail if you get the (free) apps.Another attractive feature is you can let anyone use your computer for their Email or browsing as a GUEST!  When they sign off or turn off the Cromebook ALL their activity is erased.  As far as I know they can not buy anything or even get additional free apps without them being wiped out when their session ends

Reviews.Title: It is a laptop folks.
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Floria "Tom Floria"
Reviews.Content: I know competitors are knocking it but I bought this for Christmas for my wife. She is not all the computer savy and this fits the bill for her. She does a lot of online research for recipes, art tips and instruction, gardening, anything. It works very well, it is simple and pretty user friendly. I think its a great deal. Because it doesn't have windows doesn't mean you can't use spread sheets or word processing software, Google Docs is just find for those purposes. She uses it every day.

Reviews.Title: Great tool
Reviews.Author: Isaac Meurer
Reviews.Content: The product met all expectations.  I got it on a lucky sale. Would highly suggest this as a person computer, especially for note taking and research.

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Kelcie Burns
Reviews.Content: Even though you can't use skype or microsoft office on this laptop it's great!  It's light, relatively inexpensive, and is extremely fast while searching the web.  Another thing i've noticed is it does exceptionally well at picking up wifi where there isn't much signal.  I am a student and it's seriously a blessing from the gods when I have to walk a mile to class since it's so light.  If you need something that is easy to pack up and head out with this is definitely the laptop for you.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Samsung laptop
Reviews.Author: Anna Cheeseman
Reviews.Content: I received the laptop fast and in great condition.  It is small, light it has an amazing screen nice and clear.  My family can't believe the price good value for the money.  I recommend this product for anyone that wants to do light work on your computer.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: farmer lady
Reviews.Content: So far so good , I got it for my husband for Xmas he is not big into computers .  He goes on and looks at msn and the weather and that is all ..  it is big enough for him to see.  He had a small one before.  So this works better for him lighter and he can take it outside and he will be able to see it.  It is good so far not problems but he does not do that much to get into problems. He maneuvers through it good so it is easy to do..  Keyboard is good quick.  He likes it  and it is good for a beginner that is not going to  do  a lot  on it.

Reviews.Title: Quick and very impressive!!
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I've had mine since Christmas and having had every brand of laptop, two favorite brands are Dell and Mac. This Chromebook comes closer to a Mac than any other laptop....and yes I said laptop I don't care what "Pawn Stars" says I have never seen any ad's on this laptop. You can still save notes and photos on it, but it's all web based! Amd if you have Google drive you have an office software. Power up and power down time is within seconds. I love this thing!! Limited in business and students but not too limited.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: shantanica day
Reviews.Content: i love it is truly amazing great at getting  thing done and no pop up great protection and battery last for hours and i love it  !!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: A great laptop DEAL
Reviews.Author: JMG
Reviews.Content: I had some problems with the first one after about 10 months.  NO problem.  Samsung fixed it pronto.  Have bought another for my wife.  Now there's always one handy and available.  Samsung/Google seem to be constantly updating for better operation.  Now great with photos, etc.  Google Drive is very useful.Google/Chrome OS provides some good free apps, though there is a learning curve that sometimes doesn't have enough HELP.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook, Awesome Book
Reviews.Author: Eggsandsteak
Reviews.Content: Ill keep it short. If if you want a long winded review there are plenty of them on here. The Chromebook is the best electronic device i have bought in a long time, the battery life is amazing, 6+ hrs. This device does what wever i need it to do. And with the Drive,  and the Free WI-Fi app on my phone (foxfi) i can CB it up anywhere and any time.

Reviews.Title: Keys coming off
Reviews.Author: Chanti Niven "Confident Communicator"
Reviews.Content: I ordered and received a Chromebook I ordered via Amazon in September that I'd ordered for my son for Christmas. I opened it up when it arrived and discovered the a key had fallen off and I fixed it. My son received his gift on Christmas day and was so excited he began to use it immediately but the key was sticky.  It has subsequently fallen off a number of times and now the Shift key is also not working. Overall the Chromebook seems to work well and it's nice and light but the construction of the keyboard is flimsy. He has used it for three weeks and this is happening and now I cannot return it because I bought it 4 months ago. Unfortunately that is what happens when you order well in advance for Christmas. I am going to follow up with Samsung to see if something can be done to repair the Chromebook or replace it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Hyun Seob Chung "Chris Chung"
Reviews.Content: Samsung Chromebook meets my expectations. It is fast and light. It's perfect for productivity, especially if you use Google Drive.But there are downsides. 1) in the app store, a lot of the apps are not apps. They are bookmarks that lead to flash websites. 2) Streaming movies from Google Play is slow. But it works perfectly with Amazon instant video. That's ironic, since Chromebook came from Google.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!!
Reviews.Author: J. Tyler
Reviews.Content: I got this device as an alternative to a tablet. My laptop had finally taken enough abuse and needed to be retired. I was done with college and all I really used the laptop for was internet browsing, facebooking, and online gaming (like Facebook games). It has worked very well for that purpose. If you're looking for something that runs Microsoft products, iTunes, or any other downloadable software, this is not the device for you... but if all you're looking for is a tablet with a keyboard, look at the Google Chromebook.It's incredibly lightweight. When I picked it up I nearly threw it b/c I expected more weight. When they say it fires up in 10 seconds, they are no kidding. I've restarted my device probably 20 times and it's never taken longer than 10 seconds to be fully usable.It does have word processing and spreadsheet capabilities, but I have never used these features.It's easy to use and navigate. My three year old has no trouble starting the browser and getting to her websites. My son loves the ease of using YouTube.For $200, you really can't go wrong - unless you're looking for an all inclusive laptop. This is NOT an all-inclusive laptop. It's simply a tablet with a keyboard - which is perfect for my needs. :)

Reviews.Title: Well, the 3G connection no longer exists
Reviews.Author: Sarah Mason
Reviews.Content: I like the Chromebook, but about four months after I bought it, the 3G connection that I paid extra money for is no longer available on my device. Kinda sucked when I went to use it and it wasn't there.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but printer support for chromebooks in general is an issue.
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: So I think the biggest issue with chromebooks is the printer issue.Currently chromebooks can print directly to newer printers that support cloud printing, but ours doesn't so I had to try the alternative approach which requires a separate mac or pc. I went through the steps on my mac to configure the printer and share it with my son's account so that he could print. For some reason I couldn't get it to work (but was able to follow the steps pretty easily), he still could not print.  So ok, maybe that is just a technical issue that can be resolved, but read below.Also it is unclear but I'm fairly certain this other computer (used to configure the printer) has to actually be on and in the house. So that is a big drawback especially since my printer is a laptop I carry with me. So the chromebook could be home and I could be out and my son won't be able to print (even if we solved the technical issue in paragraph 1).So bottom line is that printing is an issue. To get around this, for a paper my son had to hand in at school, he wrote it on his chromebook, shared it with me via Google docs and I opened it on my mac and printed it. Not ideal.Still I'm giving it 4 stars since printing isn't done that much these days and in general it is working well for my son and his school assignments which he does on Google Docs.

Reviews.Title: Super and affordable
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: Never so happy with a new computer.Works great never any issues.Would highly recommend as long as you can see OK on a smaller screen.

Reviews.Title: Key function not functioning.
Reviews.Author: phisllo
Reviews.Content: This device had troubles connecting to wireless networks and keeping connectivity. For a unit that is connecting you to the cloud this is just a bit inconvenient. Seems that others have had similar issues with this same model.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: jude
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews I decided to get one.  It's super easy to work.  I did get a book from the public library on its set-up andoperation.  Haven't figured out about the cloud.  I'm a happy camper and can print from another computer.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Kathi Davenport
Reviews.Content: I love the samsung chromebook ....it is fast, I don't have to worry about getting a virus. It uses the cloud so there is no hard drive to get loaded up with cookies. I also write and find it so easy to use. The tools has a research button which will allow you to look up and research a topic while writting without leaving the doc. your working on.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: K. I. HENRY
Reviews.Content: the unit came on time but was not so to speak refurbished or refresh it still had old customers information in it which had to be deleted it also did not come with the sound properly installed that needs to go to the help desk

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: julie candelaria
Reviews.Content: If you want an easy, fast, and simply to use machine, than check out the Samsung Chromebook.  It is everything and more.  You can not find a better computer for the money.  Google is in!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good performance
Reviews.Author: ivanilich cisneros sosa
Reviews.Content: It's all I expected from de samsung chromebook , light , fast  and very thin.The only thing I don't like is the charger

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: john w
Reviews.Content: because it has its own OS and im used to windows and office I have some difficulty. I use it as a frontroom pc. I just love going to the net when I don't know a word or the weather or just check email. for serious work the desk top and office is my game but this will keep you going. looks good , feels great, and yes im glad I bought it

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook vs. Macbook Air
Reviews.Author: Steve Mahoney
Reviews.Content: Great starter PC - Fast - Effective Offline such that you can run the Google Docs and Chrome Store stuff offline - SSD drives are fast - Screen is easy to read - Keyboard is comfortable to type onCons :( - No lit keyboard - A little plastic cheap feel - No iTunes (but that's Google vs. Apple stuff) - Running native MacOS, iOS, and Windows software is not there - Can run an emulator on AWS or Azure, thoughIt is worth it.  It would have gotten a 5 if some of the Cons were a feature - We'll forgive the iTunes deficiency - I have my iPhone to listen to music.If you want the complete 100% package then you will get that with a Macbook Air - However - realize that a Macbook Air is about $900 - $1000 while a Samsung Chromebook is about $240 - $250.  The Chromebook will give you about 90% of what you need.  If you need that final 10%, the Air might be a better option.- Thoughts From Steve

Reviews.Title: Great for school
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Its great for my schoolwork because I can't install computer games onto it. I use google docs for writing papers, and I can enable it to work offline and save as a .doc. The touch pad is fairly large and it's blazin' fast .I do not use social media and this is great. If I had social media I could easily see this becoming a nightmare.

Reviews.Title: The perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Margaret Puerzer
Reviews.Content: My son loves it because of the speed of action that it provides. He also likes the security that he feels isa strong point with a chromebook.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: James E. Machado
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, easy to use and excellent screen clarity. Very user friendly. Great for web surfing and many free google apps.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: Katrina
Reviews.Content: I love this Chromebook. So portable and performs all the computer tasks I need. For the price, it can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for internet use
Reviews.Author: Kay Camp
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my brother who knows computers hands down. Programmed and built them. He loved this Chrome book! Anything different and he's hooked. He replaced his laptop with this. It's perfect for checking anything on the net....email....whatever. Fast! If you want to do work then use a desktop or laptop computer but this is for fun.

Reviews.Title: WORTH IT
Reviews.Author: DEBORAH LINDNER
Reviews.Content: IM VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT MY MOM JUST LOVES IT SHE MUST USE IT AT LEAST TEN HOURS A DAY A VERY GOOD INVESTMENT

Reviews.Title: A great new approach despite hardware limitations.
Reviews.Author: Olivier Saulnier-Boileau
Reviews.Content: Pros:Chrome OS is very easy to use as it's only a browser.It does more than a tablet for me despite being much cheaper.Durable built and not cheap.Light and doesn't heat.Battery lasts.Cons:The built in media player is very basic.The graphic card has a hard time with HD files or handling a second screen connected in HDMI.The processor can be overwhelmed rapidly if streaming and browsing at the same time.Most apps for Android are not compatible.I made the cons very specific, but I am generally very satisfied with this Chromebook especially considering its price Vs a tablet. The OS is bare and fast-responding. Very convenient to use in all rooms of the house.

Reviews.Title: Nothing fancy but great buy.
Reviews.Author: costanza23
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just wanted something extra in the house because we only have computer and sometimes we both wanted to use it at the same time.The battery life is great (Samsung), it is super light and it turns off and on very fast. It is nothing fancy but a great inexpensive buy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook (Wi-Fi, 11.6-Inch)
Reviews.Author: Daedelus
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and operate.  Very good access to all apps on the internet.  I found it difficult to operate the documents part.  It did not handle Word documents for me. But all other functions were good.

Reviews.Title: The essence of simplicity
Reviews.Author: Earth-bound
Reviews.Content: This machine rocks...no, it won't completely replace your laptop because it doesn't run Quickbooks or other similar 3rd party apps, but if you can get by with a great browser (Chrome), access to the web, and google web applications, this is a perfect solution. I've read where the screen on the HP is better, and it would be great if there were lighting for the keyboard, but other than that, go for it! These things charge quickly, last all day, and boot up immediately.

Reviews.Title: Good size for desk or travel
Reviews.Author: ellen m. lenihan
Reviews.Content: Takes awhile to get used to when you've used a different laptop for years.  Has many good features, especially lack of being unable to download harmful items.

Reviews.Title: Great present!
Reviews.Author: ConnieB
Reviews.Content: I gave my daughter this chromebook as a gift at Christmas.  She loves it!  Does everything she wants and is smaller and easier for her to carry with her.  I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: Paul Cody
Reviews.Content: I work in a school district.  Never worked with a Chromebook until I worked here, this was the model that they have here.  Fell in love with the simplicity of it.  Lent my work one to my girlfriend.  She fell in love with it, so I bought her one for Christmas.  She uses it everyday.  It's a really inexpensive way to do what you need to do.  I highly recommend it for people who need a little computer to write documents, browse the web and whatnot.

Reviews.Title: Works!!!
Reviews.Author: patrick hubba
Reviews.Content: I love how it works for school, and actual work. Just dont expect it to run any video games and the only ones they have atm are just flash games.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Che
Reviews.Content: It works alright. For some reason it won't sync over large offline documents to google drive so I've had to copy and paste them to new blank documents when I do have online access otherwise the new work wont save. It's a huge pain and I hope that google fixes that issue.

Reviews.Title: Loves it
Reviews.Author: Gregory Karczewski
Reviews.Content: The grandson requested this item. He had researched it and that was the one he chose. He uses it for his home work and many other things.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook is perfect for me!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I hoped it would be.  It is very light to carry with me but can access the internet quickly and easily from wherever I am.  I wanted something with a larger screen than my Kindle fire but easy to take with me.  Just about everything I need to do can be done with this Chromebook and I am completely satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Not too sure
Reviews.Author: John Hendershott
Reviews.Content: The processing works quick and is very easy to navigate.  But the documents modifying like normal excel toolbars I haven't found if they are thereto be found.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little tablet
Reviews.Author: bonita wagoner
Reviews.Content: Love this computer, Daughter loves slim design and weight. Pretty and easy to use, she had it set up in no time!

Reviews.Title: Fast and Fun
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I was hoping it would be.  Google and Samsung really put out a nice product.  I wish I bought it sooner.

Reviews.Title: everything i need
Reviews.Author: benji377
Reviews.Content: it's light, cheap, and i've dropped it a bunch of times and it still works great. as long as you don't need to use software, it's a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Gift!
Reviews.Author: yincin
Reviews.Content: I got this chromebook as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves it! The only thing that she was somewhat disappointed in was that she can't Skype from her Chromebook.  That's a minor inconvenience given all of the added bonuses that came with the computer. She is using it during her flight across the country and will take advantage of the free movies/books offer that comes with the computer. Overall, we are both very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Great Second Computer
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I love the chromebook even more than I expected. Great battery life, light and thin. It's perfect for a second computer.

Reviews.Title: Does light web browsing
Reviews.Author: Grok Review
Reviews.Content: The software works fine. Just as expected. The touchpad is cheap and hard to control.I mainly just use it for looking up recipes to cook in the kitchen and use a real laptop for other work.

Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: Kev
Reviews.Content: At $200, the Samsung Chromebook represents a solid, no-frills, value-for-money purchase. It's also light and has decent battery life. The screen is slightly dull but OK for $200.

Reviews.Title: Great Crhistmas
Reviews.Author: Alex C.
Reviews.Content: The chromebook was a Christmas present. I purchased two and both of my daughters loved them. They have been using them everyday since Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Pretty slick
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: Bought this for Christmas to share with my 7 year old son and so far it's a hit. Getting used to the track pad scrolling takes a little thought and not being able to print directly from the Chromebook sucks, but other than that we love it. The display looks great, it boots up and is ready to go in less than 5 seconds and does everything we need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Larry Brooks
Reviews.Content: A great device for the money. I have used one of these for about a year and enjoyed it, so I bought it as a gift for Christmas. It was well received.

Reviews.Title: wonderful gift.
Reviews.Author: Patricia Lehr
Reviews.Content: My son loves this Chrombook. Works great, love all the functions that it has on it.Great for all his needs!

Reviews.Title: A great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Brandy Duley
Reviews.Content: Light weight, sleek, fast and easy to use.  I purchased this for my 14 year old and he is very happy with it.  It's reasonably priced as well.

Reviews.Title: Clearly awesome
Reviews.Author: Average Girl
Reviews.Content: Love the case has kept it looking brand new good quality. Easy to clear when needed travels well and fits perfect

Reviews.Title: Excellent little work machine!
Reviews.Author: Greg Hager
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this if you're expecting to replace your desktop or even your laptop.  If you want a tablet that has a little more functionality with a nice keyboard and Google Chrome to boot, this is your ticket.  I love it.  If you're used to using Chrome Browser and it's internal apps then this is a natural progression.  Works great and does everything I need it to do at work.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: S R
Reviews.Content: Don't believe the hype or ads.  Other manfacturers are jealous and envious.  Great unit.  Great price, need I say more.

Reviews.Title: Best computer I've ever owned for the price, by far.
Reviews.Author: ShettyBrain "SB"
Reviews.Content: I have no worries about it ever breaking (due to the SSD hard drive), it's extremely light-weight, boots up almost instantly, has a ton of interesting apps, and has literally never crashed on me,Perfect for anyone who needs a laptop just to get on the internet with, and comes with free office software (Google Apps).No complaints about this computer what so ever.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Carbon Valley Child Care
Reviews.Content: Sper easy to use, lightweight, great for homework, scheduling, and internet based projects or work. Very easy to set up multiple users so we use this computer for our 4 kids. Love this little laptop!

Reviews.Title: Confirmed Chromie!
Reviews.Author: Carol Domasco
Reviews.Content: What a marvelous machine! The Samsung Chromebook not only met but exceeded my expectations! It may be a lightweight in terms of pounds and ounces,(an important feature) but it is a heavyweight as regards its construction, convenience and capabilities. After a month of using it I look forward to a long and even more productive association. I was not at all intimidated by the slight changes in keyboard layout and function, because the tutorials are clear, concise and practical in addressing this issue and in providing information in every other slight or major alteration as well as in instruction for 'totally Google' innovations such as its wholly internet-based concept. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a student
Reviews.Author: W. Hinsch "Technophile"
Reviews.Content: We went in for half the cost of one of these for our daughter about six months ago. She is in high school and was looking for the right combination of price, portability, long battery life, and utility. We can't say enough good things about the Chromebook. We were thrilled with the value and our daughter loves everything else about it. With thousands of other reviews, I'll keep this short. However:Pros:o  Priceo  Portability / weighto  Functionality (office tools, lightweight games, mathematics (in addition to some good graphing calculator apps, Wolfram Alpha is your friend)o  Long battery lifeCons:o  Higher resolution screen would be nice. Tablets are setting the standards here, and that isn't right.o  Occasionally (rarely) reboots on its own without warning. (updates? memory leak?)Recommendations:o  Definitely get the 3g version unless you KNOW you will have wi-fi all the time. You can do some things offline, but you'll miss the connectivity. Seriously, the approx. $100 prepaid for two years of lightweight 3g service is money well spent.o  The iPearl hardshell case is unobtrusive and adds some needed rigidity and protection.o  If you plan on taking this device anywhere I think a protection plan is a good idea. The world is out to destroy traveling electronic devices.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for travel
Reviews.Author: Jodie Gardner-Grandberry
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  This is a great alternative to a big laptop and is much easier to travel with.  Battery life isn't amazing but it's not too bad.  Google offers some really great apps.  This works great for web-based activity and is worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: James D. Ragsdale
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife and she can check e-mail, Facebook, and surf the web without the complications of a regular lap-top, simple and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Herbert Snyder
Reviews.Content: Very happy.Delivered quickly and as promisedSaved me hundreds of dollars over another laptop since it meets my needs (internet, e-mails) while away on a trip

Reviews.Title: Impressed teens
Reviews.Author: sue lehane
Reviews.Content: My 15 year old got this for Christmas He loves it His cousins were over and they were equally impressed ;we all know how difficult it is to impress teenagers

Reviews.Title: Good product, until the screen cracks after less than a year of use
Reviews.Author: Julien Amelot
Reviews.Content: The top left corner of the screen cracked spontaneously despite being handled with care, which seems to be a common defect of the product.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Grandma Extrordinaire
Reviews.Content: Boots up so fast, has 2.0 and 3.0 usb ports. Bigger screen and better battery life than a tablet and lots of features make this even better.Very lightweight - so easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: A. King
Reviews.Content: This is a great little notebook if you have all your stuff already set up on a desktop. I would not recommend this for someone who doesn't also have access to a desktop computer. You will need the desktop to run larger things off of, and to use a printer remotely. We use the Chromebook as a remote desktop when away from home and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Battery Life, Needs Higher Touch Pad Click Life
Reviews.Author: A. Semler "The Nerd"
Reviews.Content: I've had this for a year, and I love how lightweight and quick it is, as well as the impressive battery life.  The only thing is that now after 13 months of heavy use, the "click" has gone out of the touch pad - it still functions, but it doesn't make that "click" sound or spring back up like it used to.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Stew Ussery
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this little computer it's fast, battery is strong and last, I am able to charge my phone through it but unfortunately my computer does not recognize my phone as an attachment. I really would like to sync my contacts and make adjustments with the computer but I'm unable to do that without going to a web site.

Reviews.Title: A few issues, otherwise a great product
Reviews.Author: Sujit Vasudev
Reviews.Content: Its an excellent second laptop at home, a great primary laptop on the move, and a lightweight option to carry around in your back pack all the time.If only:1. It worked with chromecast.2. It could support direct connection with cameras, phones, etc via USB or bluetooth.3. It could support logins for children younger than 13 yrs (google account required for login)4. It could include some key keys - Home, End, Del

Reviews.Title: Sent it to my son for a gift
Reviews.Author: jazz lover
Reviews.Content: christmas gift, delivered on time. It is attractive and he likes it. It was cheaper than office max and free delivery. Chrome is different than windows , check the chrome website to see how. You cannot run windows stuff on your computer but instead you must use something called  cloud , this is stored on their website .On my computer I must work in areas without electrical power. I need to store information on windows 8 within  I need to delete and add information for recrd without internet access my computer so cloud is not for me.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: M. Myers
Reviews.Content: The chromebook is a nice small lightweight laptop. It is perfect for surfing the web its fast and has some decent features

Reviews.Title: Great Browser
Reviews.Author: Fred Rogers
Reviews.Content: After another PC crashed from web use I decided to take a look at the Chrome browser system from Google.  Value? Very good.  For around $250 it is a great buy as the experience I have had with 1500 dollar PC's do not have anything against these Chrome books.  Although it does not have a DVD drive it does most everything I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: great upgrade
Reviews.Author: Michael A. King "Finny the Fish plush [toy]"
Reviews.Content: so love the ease of use and the lack of updates! I use google for everything anyway so it wasn't hard adjusting to this product.  The only thing is now I must update my printer as it is not compatable.  Kind of a downer but not a deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: Great web browsing device!
Reviews.Author: Seadude
Reviews.Content: Yes, it has its limitations, but I would prefer this device with it's real keyboard to a touch-tablet any day!

Reviews.Title: Very sleek
Reviews.Author: zannie
Reviews.Content: This computer is compact, light weight, responses quickly and can go anywhere in a snap. I am very very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: 4 Stars - for now
Reviews.Author: Aimee Hornsby
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my daughter for Christmas.  I played around with it a little bit to get it set up for her for Christmas morning.  The little bit I have used it - WOW!  Super fast web browsing and downloading of apps.  As in introductory "lap top" for a soon-to-be 9 year old, I think it will be great.

Reviews.Title: Just what it claims to be
Reviews.Author: Soox
Reviews.Content: Hardly a powerful computing system, or even all that amazing, but this little guy is pretty cool for replacing doing all my internet on a Kindle Fire. I like the reasonable size and light weight. I'm still sort of surprised that there's no fan. It's quick on my home wi-fi system, although I haven't taken it out in public yet and suspect that a slower signal could slow it down. Still, it's nice to have a keyboard again and something that can work with my chromecast besides my phone. Reasonable price, too. I haven't tried out the google drive yet because I don't have a whole lot of things I need to save on the cloud, but I suspect I'll like that just fine, too.

Reviews.Title: One of the best gifts I have recieved
Reviews.Author: Sandra Mazey
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Chromebook I was given as a gift. It does everything I need it to do and more. It is stylish and light weight making it ideal to take with me.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Prime Instant Videos stopped playing.
Reviews.Author: Peninsula
Reviews.Content: Amazon Prime Instant Videos stopped playing.How annoying is that?  It WAS working and then it stopped.  I've searched around the internet and tried a couple of different "fixes"; neither worked for me.  Unfortunately, this has occurred beyond my 30-day window; otherwise, this would be going back to Amazon NOW.I did give it 3 stars because up until this point, I really liked this machine.  It is perfect for emailing, checking the news, using Google Calendar, browsing the web in general.  It USED to be good at streaming video, but I've already griped about that.  If I can't find a fix for the streaming, I'm coming back and editing this to reflect a lower score.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for most things, not good for online learning with live lessons
Reviews.Author: kimemeki
Reviews.Content: This is a great little machine everyone loves using it so far. The only thing we have tried to do on it so far that was a problem is access video conferencing for live lessons through school or webinars from various vendors because you can not download and install the items needed to this device. I have also had people say Skype works now but I have been unable to figure that out so far but thats fine since we have other devices for that and google hangout works just fine as a replacement. One problem I have noticed is if I put too much pressure on the left side of the device it will not function properly. It took me awhile to figure it out and was upset at first thinking it really was a piece of junk that I would have to return but once I realized I was creating the problem I adjusted my positioning and haven't had any additional problems. Not so much as hiccup! Very happy :)

Reviews.Title: Good, but beware some technological issues
Reviews.Author: AST
Reviews.Content: I got a Chromebook after my old laptop started having technical problems and I couldn't afford a new computer. All in all, it is very good. Not excellent, but very good. The pros: it turns on in only a few seconds, it is super light, the battery life is wonderful, I can write documents on Google Docs and do all the interneting I need to. The cons: it is definitely not a laptop. Google Docs and all the other Word-analogous programs are ok, but inferior to Word. There are just so many little things that Google Docs cannot do. I can't figure out how to make my default text anything besides Ariel size 11. I can't copy and paste more than one image at once. If I export a Google Doc as a Word Doc, the margins will be messed up. And, most frustratingly, somehow Times New Roman size 12 font is larger in Google Docs than it is in Microsoft Word, because if I copy and paste something it'll be a different length. Also, be warned: Google Spreadsheets are FAR inferior to Excel. They cannot do trend lines, which is kind of the most important thing that a spreadsheet analysis program does (for me, at least), so that's unfortunate. Google Drive will just NOT sync with my files on my laptop, even when I let it upload for hours and it says it's finished. I have to upload everything directly with Chrome, I can't rely on putting files in the folder that shows up in the My Computer tab. For some reason my mouse will disappear periodically and it takes a few minutes of frantic clicking and/or typing before it will reappear. And my Chromebook is only three months old. Basically, what I've had to do is cut back my real laptop use to just Excel and other programs I need for work, and then use the Chromebook for all the internet and writing I have to do. Which is working fine, and definitely hurt my wallet less than a new computer would have. The Chromebook is great for carrying around and using on the go. But it is not a computer, and the limited functions it has probably don't cut it (as the only computer-like device) for a lot of people these days. The Chromebook probably would be great for kids or older people who only need word processing and the internet though.

Reviews.Title: Great, with some flaws
Reviews.Author: Hi Desert
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer to use for taking online college classes. The speed of the wifi, ease of setup (really, there's essentially no setup), battery life, and price are exceptional. The keyboard is good -- nice satisfying feel, although not on part with a desktop's keyboard. In general I've found the system easy to use, but there are a few exasperating things about Chrome that will pop up now and again and leave me tearing out my hair. For instance: you can't access documents stored on the computer when you're offline (or maybe you can and I haven't figured it out yet). It's also difficult to find documents on the computer, say something that you downloaded. This system is obviously set up to work online, and only online. Google's apps like Sheet and Doc work pretty well, but if you're used to Microsoft you'll find that Google's products are generally awkward and slightly inferior reproductions. They do, however, work for all your basic needs and the free online storage lets me access them at home, work, wherever I can get online. If you can work exclusively online and need to surf the web, write basic documents, and want an inexpensive way to do it, this chromebook is a solid choice -- just not perfect. Lastly, I've been impressed by battery life -- I easily get 4-5 hours while typing or surfing the web.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: holli strong
Reviews.Content: great little computer! its  perfect for someone watching movies and just browing the web. my mom i a teacher and all of her students use them in school. really easy to use and portable

Reviews.Title: Fast and low cost
Reviews.Author: Lonnie
Reviews.Content: Very fast and  starts up immediately.  Love it.  Also the best value at $250.Best product for internet portal for me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids and students
Reviews.Author: Mike P
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect for my high schooler who needed a device for school.  The battery lasts all day, it is light and well built.As others have mentioned and description says, this device boots in seconds, it is fast and perfect for anyone who can do everything through the Google Chrome browser.  As long as you have an internet connection, this is a great device.  There is not a lot of storage on this device but the intent is to use Google Drive which stores everything out in the cloud (stores in the Google data center and you access over internet).  You can use an SD card to add more storage but was disappointed that the slot does not allow the card to be flush, therefore able to be left in all time.  There are some USB ports and the micro USB keys would work too.For those who are use to Windows and laptops with multiple mouse buttons, the glide pad will take some adjustment.  There is no button to push, and just left mouse click.Screen is clear and big enough to see everything.It has been dropped a few times and not damaged, minor scratches.  But at $200 not as big of a loss as a $500+ laptop, plus everything is in the cloud so moving to a new Chromebook is easy.I would say for $200 this is a perfect device for students and kids.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook Review
Reviews.Author: Joyce W Dreiling
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung Chromebook.  I am on it everyday.  I like that I can read my kindle books on it. It is great.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Dean E. Kroft

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Don Perry
Reviews.Content: Good quality and price.  Long battery life.Good value for the money.  Not as versatile as a Windows or MAC,  butserves its purpose for someone who just wants to surf the web or emailyour friends.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy until they fix the bug!!
Reviews.Author: PAEME
Reviews.Content: I loved this at first, it's light, fast and easy to use.  Then I started getting the error message that is "didn't shut down correctly". At first I could press "restore" and it would come back. Eventually the Chromebook was completely locked up and completely unusable (mo exaggeration).  It has been sent back to Samsung TWICE to be fixed and has been returned usable for a few hours and then back to the same error message.  Research has indicated this is a bug that google has not been able to fix, and my Chromebook is proof.  So sad my husband wasted $250 purchasing this for me.  Next step is to try to get a replacement, but I'm not optimistic a different machine will behave differently.

Reviews.Title: Great for what I need!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Hubbard
Reviews.Content: I just needed it for basic computer use, using the internet and homework. It is portable for when I take it to class, very easy to use, and very affordable.

Reviews.Title: Local Storage or Web storage depends on your needs
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The product when I bought was $116.00 ( a deal of the day type of thing) so, I bought it; these are normally $250.00This is solely for a person who uses the WEB a lot of the time and have a gmail account; gmail is recommended to use the chromebook to the fullest.The Chromebook runs very smoothly and is quick between tasks. The os on this is CHROME OS which is quite different from most OS'S that end users use it will take to getting use to but, will not take long.This one I own, has a 16gssd, 4g of ram, 1.3 GHz Intel Celeron and the battery will go for about 6 hours, has two usb ports (2.0 and 3.0), one hdmi port, an sd slot, and this a series 5.If you're someone that will use this for web based tasks go for it. I have yet to see someone in a work environment or a student for that matter use this unless they use google docs etc that google actually offers a lot of.Having said that though if either of those two types users have a gmail and access google apps they will be very happy with this. The internet ever decides to not work on your chromebook, you could be in a tight spot of you need something from your docs in the one of the apps that is web based.

Reviews.Title: Lot of performance,little money
Reviews.Author: larry
Reviews.Content: setup was very easy. router access was very fast. I've used chrome for years,so nothing new here. had not used touchpad before,so that took maybe 20-30 minutes getting accustomed.off to the races.an amazing amount of performance for a couple hundred bucks.

Reviews.Title: Not for everyone, perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Tae
Reviews.Content: I just finished a graduate program and have used this for over a year now, as a student, a job-seeker, an employee, and just for random daily tasks. I'll speak personally from how this has helped me in my specific situation, in case there is someone who may be in a similar situation.There are a few things about me that made me a great fit for this product:1) I own a desktop computerThere are some things I need a desktop for, and I have a desktop computer for those occasions. Interestingly, one of the things I learned is how little I really needed my desktop. I packed it away and didn't bother unpacking it for two months now. If anything it's probably a good thing that I can't play video games on this thing, so if you're a recovered game addict with relapsing tendencies (like yours truly), that's something to consider. But there are some things I'll definitely need the desktop for, such as photo editing, which I will eventually need to unpack the desktop to do.2) I use Google everything (gmail, drive, calendar, etc.)And so do a lot of my friends, making it very easy to work on Google and share my work with others. The suite of Google office products are pretty handy, and for most uses is more than sufficient. Because google docs do not count against your size limit on Google Drive, it feels like unlimited storage to me, and I've done just fine without any additional storage.3) I use Amazon Prime (mainly for movies, Kindle books)The vast majority of "apps" that you can add on the chromebook do little more than provide you a link, turning the bottom bar into a glorified "favorites" bar. The kindle is one exception, since you are able to download books for offline reading. Since I watch all my movies through Amazon Prime, it's not a big deal that there's no DVD player.4) I intend to carry this around all over the placeThis is ideal for carrying around because it's light and thin (I just leave it in my bag and I never think "dang it, I shouldn't have brought my laptop today") the battery life is great (I never really have to bring the charger unless I forgot to charge it the night before) and it's cheap (I've dropped it and I've dropped the bag it's in many times, but it hasn't broken yet, and I wouldn't be totally bummed as I would be if I dropped some other really expensive thin light laptop).5) The places I go have wifi anywayStarbuck's, McDonald's, school, library, etc. In my neighborhood there are a lot of places to go for free wifi.A few reasons why this product was not a good fit:1) Skydrive is not that good.This isn't Google's fault, but it does affect my review of whether or not you should buy this chromebook, because the chromebook is only as good as the apps that what it can run in the browser. The truth is that Skydrive is nowhere close to the much more robust Google Drive. It technically does a lot of the same things, and in some ways it is indeed better than Google drive at handling MS Office documents, but I've had too many instances where the website would fail and I would lose something I had been working on. No matter how many bells and whistles it has, the fact that it can't reliably work on things has made me lose hope on skydrive, so now if I really want to fine-tune a MS Office document, I have to find a PC.2) It's kind of weak sauce.It's okay with most things, and I can watch movies on it full-screen, but sometimes it's just slow, especially if you have a lot of tabs open. I've learned to be a lot more disciplined about tab-closing, and that's helped, but at some point the thing is just slow, and when I'm trying to work with two windows at the same time, scheduling things and responding to e-mails and such, there's a slight lag that will make things take longer than they would otherwise.CONCLUSION:If you're a no-frills kind of person and you're looking for something like this, then I recommend it, especially if you're broke like me. It doesn't have a lot of (or any, really) bells or whistles, but it can get quite a bit done. The times are a-changin', and as the cloud expands in the size and diversity of products they offer, this will become even more useful over time.

Reviews.Title: Amazing device for thr price

Reviews.Title: Google Chrome laptop

Reviews.Title: love my Samsung chrome notebook.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic

Reviews.Title: my new chromebook is great

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Title: It's ggggreat!!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Rice
Reviews.Content: Love it, it's liteweight,fits right in my small travel bag.Go's any where i go, hooks right up...LOVE IT,Bob P.S you'll love it too!!!!!

Reviews.Title: The Internet PC has fnally arrived

Reviews.Title: Just what it needs to be.
Reviews.Author: Bob Moon
Reviews.Content: I bought the Chromebook as a writing tool, but also knowing that I would use it for all the many web based behaviors I have developed. It works perfectly for the way I use a laptop, is way more useful than trying to write on a tablet, and it's just right for carrying around. The keyboard is really nice to use.The Chromebook is not pretending or trying to be the latest, best, fastest, most techno bit of up to date soon to be out dated device. It is not a brand new shiny Apple that will be old news in six months, it is not the latest and greatest Windows whatever,it does not have the most advanced screen, and so what, everything on the screen looks good to me. It is a simple, functional tool that is very reasonably priced and works incredibly well, and what else does it need to be?

Reviews.Title: awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Talia Day "Talia Day"
Reviews.Content: I love this samsung chromebook. Super light and operates just as fast as any computer. wifi connection is great. would definitely recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for browsing & typing
Reviews.Author: MauraC
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a chromebook as a lightweight and portable alternative to my 6lb Dell Studio 1558. It is exactly what I was looking for. The bootup time is no lie--7 seconds from powered off to an open browser, for me. The battery life is also surprisingly long. I use it on and off (maybe an hour on and typing, and an hour hibernating) for 8+ hours and it still has battery left. It's super lightweight, and the keyboard is very easy to type on. The OS is fast. I've experienced some lag when I'm watching a youtube video and trying to google hangout and type at the same time, but Netflix works great and listening to music (I use Rhapsody) while multitasking is seamless.Definitely not a full-featured machine (that's what the Dell is for), but my primary uses are browsing the internet, listening to music, and working on googledocs, so it's perfect! I would highly recommend this cheap alternative to anyone looking to do those things.

Reviews.Title: google chromebook

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Title: Loved it

Wrong move on my part nothing wrong with the Samsung Tab 2 just our usage is more in need of a computer for typing, etc. This chrome book is a fantastic small easy to understand and use item. Reviews.Author: charla
Reviews.Content: this is a perfect computer if all you need is an internet computer.  I just needed something easily transported and that had web access and this fit the bill perfectly.  I had no issues getting it up and running

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Roger L.
Reviews.Content: Rarely lags.I installed crouton, now it's just an all in one computer. Decent speed, all my programs, and so lightweight. So. lightweight.

Reviews.Title: Will give it 5 star
Reviews.Author: shikoh
Reviews.Content: Hi this is the best small Samsung Chromebook ever i bought it on March 2013 but unfortunately it fells and broke the screen.But thanks i had a warrant from Square trade and they pay me within two days. Thanks Square trade will buy another one and will never stay without a warrant.

Reviews.Title: Like my Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Ford
Reviews.Content: I like everything about it.  Since I have a desktop computer, I enjoy the portability.  I don't care to read books on a computer so this netbook is perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: lightweight!!
Reviews.Author: mryogik
Reviews.Content: Very light weight, so easy to carry around. Verizon gives 100 mb per month for 2 years (included in price).It does slow down if you have too many tabs open. may be works good with 4 tabs at a time...

Reviews.Title: I love this Chromebook!!
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I was shocked at how lite this was. It is small and easy to carry. It is amazingly fast and comes on in seconds. I have to fight with the rest of the family to get to use it. Great price and a great product. Would recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: aususa
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the Chromebook I find light easy portable. I love that I am not dragging around my large heavy 17" aspire that I use for all my heavy work. I much prefer using the Chromebook to Ipad. Still working out the touchpad and I found it worthwhile to read up on some of the tips. If you have your head around that it is not a regular laptop and more like a tablet then this is the way to go..This is great for travel!

Reviews.Title: handy carry around tablet
Reviews.Author: shamus
Reviews.Content: good item to carry around without having to worry about losing it.Fast, excellant battery life.  Best for those who are fairly familiar with laptop's

Reviews.Title: I like it, it has limitations, can't use bluetooth headset
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I liked it but was unable to get the cloud storage. I contacted the chrome ninja and despite my saying this was a new device, I received a cryptic reply that it was not a new device and did not qualify for the 100gb storage. BAD SERVICE!!!! I will update if they fix it. Update: cloud storage issue is fixed but it took a few emails. I researched the device but never saw that bluetooth was for mouse and keyboard only, not for headsets. A workaround could be a bluetooth transmitter into the headset jack, but it is a disappointment and likely won't work without a lag for videos. The screen isn't great but ok for the price. The device still is worth having with the fast internet and applications and no virus issues.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Edmund M.
Reviews.Content: The product seems to be a lot sturdier than other reviewers have said. There's very little flex in the in the screen though some have said otherwise. The screen could use a bit better resolution, but it's definitely acceptable. It's a much better value than my i-pad at about half the price. Much more versatile. Excellent battery life and very portable.

Reviews.Title: Perfect second or travel PC
Reviews.Author: mushkudi
Reviews.Content: Outstanding PC for the price. Very innovative and forward looking product in terms of build as well as the usage of cloud services. Comfortable keyboard, descent screen and excellent battery life. As far as the hardware is concerned, it would be good to see improved webcam and more RAM on the machine. In terms of software, having Skype and Georgian language input support for Chrome OS would be nice additions. Discontinuation of Google Calendar Sync is a nuisance. I was unable to find any viable alternative to it to sync Outlook and Google Calendars. The software issues, I suspect, are related to Microsoft - Google rivalry and hope are resolved in the near future. I still give five stars to Chromebook as the shortcomings mentioned above are minor and possible to improve.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Griffin Wooldridge
Reviews.Content: This laptop is faster than most and easy to use. It's small and light, making it easy to carry around. The only thing I don't like about it is that it can't run applications like Skype since it's a completely different type of laptop. Great for the price. Recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I like the chromebook.
Reviews.Author: P. Summerfield
Reviews.Content: It's small, inexpensive, has a great keyboard, much faster than my old bogged down, constantly updating Windows based computers.  Still getting used to cloud based activities.  Printing to a "classic" printer is a bit cumbersome, but working well.

Reviews.Title: just what i needed
Reviews.Author: joseph
Reviews.Content: I love the chrome book it's just what I needed until I get a better laptop the only downside us that I can't install something like itunes onto the chromebook

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: robert llamas
Reviews.Content: I love it, bit different than standard computer but overall simplified without the nonsense programs avg browsers do not use! small and compact fits anywere when traveling. Great product

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Daniel L. Kirsch
Reviews.Content: We ordered the chromebook to replace the wife's laptop.  It has exceeded my expectations on what it is capable of handling and has been meeting all of her needs.  The only complaint is the touchpad.  It seems to be very inaccurate and some of the selections are rather difficult, needing to press in the 1/8" bottom most corners.

Reviews.Title: Mom's mothers day gift
Reviews.Author: Louisa Villamar
Reviews.Content: She loved it and was very happy though needs more memory.  Wish it could do a little bit more than what it already does

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Ron King
Reviews.Content: I have had my Chromebook for a couple of months now.  I delayed in reviewing the product until I had a thorough understanding of it's performance.  I am a very satisified customer.  I have all the mobility in the world now, house, garage, basement.  I am still trying to understand how to my Chromebook to its fullest, and I know I can only enjoy it more as I become a more proficient user.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Peter W.
Reviews.Content: This machine is amazing for $249.The keyboard is the best keyboard I have ever used.The touchpad is awesome.The speakers are loud. Not what an audiophile would appreciate however my 3 year old can hear his youtube stuff in a room with other noise.I like to use multiple browser windows versus a single browser window with mutilple tabs.
