I have 10 windows open with each having maybe 2 to 4 related tabs and I have no slow down at all.The quality is very good and solid.The screen is plenty bright.I bought it here at Amazon, price is awesome: http://amzn.to/13sIofW

Reviews.Title: samsung chromebook
Reviews.Author: baraitna
Reviews.Content: As I learn more how to use it I probably give it a 5-star rating. Used to my old window based pc keyboard it is difficult to use this one's.

Reviews.Title: functional, but hot and dim
Reviews.Author: Terri Schoone
Reviews.Content: I like my Chromebook, it has everything I need to do my work, including online grading. It is small, light and easy to carry, with all of the ports I need including HDMI. I only have 2 negatives, but they are pretty big: it gets HOT and the screen is dim. I don't like working with this on my lap unless I have something to protect my legs. It gets uncomfortably hot. I also haven't figured out the screen brightness. I haven't found a setting. Sometimes it is bright but most of the time it is dim and hard to read, even when plugged in.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Benjamin G. Sherman
Reviews.Content: It's- very, very light- fast as you could expect from an Internet-only product (not light-speed, but fast)- keys have dignity- good soundTwo weird flaws- you can't open it with one hand, you'll need two since it is so light- the screen "catches" when you open it, giving you some glitch but then it works fineThe computer has honestly replaced my old laptop, which I was expecting it only to supplement. It's so fast and easy, and since I use Google Docs and have Spotify, I barely use non-Internet computer functions.

Reviews.Title: Good Replacement for a laptop
Reviews.Author: ReviewerMelitaNO
Reviews.Content: I use the Chromebook to avoid carrying around an expensive, heavy laptop, full of software that has to be constantly updated. I just use Chrome Remote Desktop, connect to my Mac desktop or PC desktop to access whatever application I need. I like that I can use it offline to take notes using Google Docs. I really like the free airline Gogo Internet passes, and the 100 GB for three years Google Drive storage. I did not give it 5 stars because the cursor disappears frequently after booting up. It is difficult to bring the cursor back. This is not a hardware glitch but a software glitch that Google needs to fix. This is well documented on Chromebook forums. A quick way to get the cursor back is to plug a mouse in a USB port of the device. Restarting it and shutting it down by holding the start button between 8 and 30 seconds, sometimes resurrects the cursor. The Chromebook boots fast, it works well with Google Hangouts video chats.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Anne Murray "outdoor girl"
Reviews.Content: Looking around for smaller laptops for my teenage son, I found this one after seeing favorable reviews. It lives up to its reputation. Compact and sturdy, it goes anywhere. The keyboard is comfortable. Now we just have a challenge keeping it away from his dad!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook is OK but not intuitive to use.
Reviews.Author: Al Potere
Reviews.Content: And, I seem to be unable to connect a printer to the computer.  Also, I connected an external mouse and it's very slow.

Reviews.Title: Dollar for dollar, a lot of computer
Reviews.Author: Charlee R Snow
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for my daughter (30, married, multiple rug rats).  So far, she loves it.  For one thing, it's fast.  I mean, imagine a 100 Ghz computer running Microsoft Windows.  In many respects it's similar to an Android device, but here again it outperforms your typical Android tablet by an order of magnitude.  The two ways it's most obviously faster is in booting up (turning on) and doing web searches.  She's tried all her usual things with it, paying bills, uploading photos, typing emails; all with good to excellent results.Limitations:1.  Chrome reassigns the Caps Lock key to Search.  This can cause confusion if you're used to typing stuff in all uppercase.2.  The OS is so similar to Android one would expect it to have a touch screen, but the Samsung does not.  You have to go to a much more expensive unit to get this feature.  This causes frustration, especially if you are a long-time Android user.3.  GPS seems to work when at home hooked to her families WiFi, but once she's on the road it goes kablooie.  This is also a frustration to long-time Android users.4.  The touch pad is hard to get used to.  There are no buttons, so you have to press down to simulate a left click.  There seems to be nothing to simulate a right click.The bottom line is that, for the price, it's a great value.

Reviews.Title: Replaced my 5 lb. Dell Laptop
Reviews.Author: A. J. Minhas "althotos"
Reviews.Content: At half the weight of my Dell laptop, not including accessories, I should have gotten this last year. I waited 6 months to see how the reviews and users liked this device. I should have had faith in Chrome, which the only browser I use at home, work and on the road. When I travel, 95% of my needs are met via the Chrome browser and most places, such as hotels and restaurants have Wi-Fi. For places that don't have Wi-Fi, I can use my Android Smartphone with a 4G signal and full-fledged Chrome browser to accomplish the rest. I love this device.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the money
Reviews.Author: glenn murray
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with the quality and speed great gift, the battery life is surprisingly long would recommend to anyone looking for email use etc

Reviews.Title: Slim, Sleek, Light
Reviews.Author: Trent Van Gorp
Reviews.Content: This chromebook is everything you could ask for in a portable computer. It's perfect for watching videos, browsing websites, or even doing homework. The only thing that I was disappointed in was the fact that the paint scratches very easily but other than that there are no complaints. I highly recommend this laptop!

Reviews.Title: greatings from venezuela
Reviews.Author: JOSE BOLIVAR
Reviews.Content: It has been a good buy. The team arrived in perfect condition and has so far provided no fault .. I really enjoyed this article and attention provided by amazon. lead times are respected for what I am very good with amazon as a supplier ... He has really done a good job ... Greetings from Venezuela ... computer recommend it 100 percent ...

Reviews.Title: You can't beat this for the money
Reviews.Author: T. J. Craig Jr.
Reviews.Content: Any person I showed the Chromebook to that has a tablet wishes they got one of these instead.  Having a USB port and keyboard makes this really convenient, and the light weight is easy to tote around the country.

Reviews.Title: great great great
Reviews.Author: gabbi ariza
Reviews.Content: awsome i love itlooks and runs as brand new.next day deliver was a plussim love it !

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: SZH
Reviews.Content: Great laptop. I highly recommend it for a light travel laptop for web-only tasks.Most people don't do much more than email and web browsing on their computers, so this Chromebook is generally enough, at least as a secondary PC.

Reviews.Title: Cannot use chromebook to access work thru citrix
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Ignacio
Reviews.Content: I bought the chromebook thinking that I will be able to use it to connect to my work using Citrix and I was wrong. I could connect to citrix from my laptop, android, etc but for some reason, you need to have StoreFront configure in our Citrix environment for the chromebook to connect.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this machine !!!
Reviews.Author: newlife "newlife"
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this machine, I have only had it about a week but I am in Love.I don't have to turn it on as soon as the lid opens it is powered onI am on my desktop, and 1 second later I am on the internet, and apps..keyboard is the best I have ever had huge keys and no caps button.No junk to slow it down, always fast and easy to navigate, the OS is stripped down bare essentials.no backing things up, no virus protection needed..My only con is that I cannot print coupons from my Chromebook- this operating system has no flash, but had I investigated more I would have known this before purchase, but everything is so amazing I can overlook some things. If you are a light internet user, this OS Chromebook is for you.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Laurie Ludemann
Reviews.Content: This laptop is great for those who travel a lot but need a computer/laptop.  The keyboard and mouse pad could be better but at 250 it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Computer
Reviews.Author: L. BEAUMONT "lynn beaumont"
Reviews.Content: Great computer for the money. It's light weight, easy to transport, and it's thin so you are to carry with ease. Great buy for the money and you get a lot .

Reviews.Title: Nice Inexpensive Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Edward Brown
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my brother for his birthday and so far it is working like a champ.  It is smaller then I thought but it's portable and light exactly what he was looking for. Will update as time passes but as of right now I would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: WiFi connection issue that are not resolvable.
Reviews.Author: Brian Berryhill
Reviews.Content: By the time I got the delivery text I was already watching YouTube. Log into Google/Chrome and your set up is done. Now after using this for a month I have discovered it will not hold a consistent WiFi connection. You can't even completely open a web page without it losing the connection. This issue is well documented on the Web and I tried the fixes listed with no change. Sadly I have returned my Chromebook. Grand idea, poorly executed.

Reviews.Title: Lives up to expectations (and then some)
Reviews.Author: Parella "JL"
Reviews.Content: Really attractive little machine.  Plastic frame feels a little brittle but otherwise well made with perfectly adequate screen and a key board which feels and functions like a much more expensive one.  Everything feels light and ergonomic.Know what you are buying but don't be deterred by the "it's only a browser not a laptop" dismissal.  Sure you can't load MS Office and, irritatingly, neither Skype nor Google Earth are currently supported but for fast, smooth, silent use of the web and cloud it's just about perfect.  Well, a sleek aluminium body would make it so.

Reviews.Title: Pretty sweet
Reviews.Author: Colby Pederson
Reviews.Content: It's all about Google and android software/os if you like that then you will like this chromebook. It is like having a phone in laptop form.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Roger Christensen
Reviews.Content: This is a great item at a great cost. I am getting a classroom set for my students next year. Great learning tool.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: kathryn castelazo
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my mom who is starting college in the fall. She isn't verry computer savy but she figured this one out just fine! and She farms (farmville) on it all the time.

Reviews.Title: I bought 5. Seriously
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: I'm not using any of them, but I've lent out two to my students, and my father, sister, and mother all have one. So far, everyone seems happy. I'm still waiting to see if we can create a Rube Goldberg machine out of Chromebooks.

Reviews.Title: Great little laptop for surfing web.
Reviews.Author: M. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these for my daughters. They mainly just play games online and check out YouTube video's and stuff like that. So this fit the bill perfectly. My wife also uses them with no problem at all. The operating system is super simple and I love the fact that I don't get any more phone calls at work because windows is asking permission for some update and my wife doesn't know if she should or shouldn't. If you just use your computer for web based stuff. This is a great OS for that purpose. I have my Mac for my recording studio. Microsoft OS for work and now Chrome for simple safe web surfing and NO maintenance!!! Great for the family!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice and clean
Reviews.Author: black mike
Reviews.Content: Came as ordered and fast delivery.Was here in Mass in 3days by 8:30 am fri morn.Disappointed no instruction manual. Dont know how to transfer files from phone and would like to know how to hook up internet in my house.Do I need a roouter?

Reviews.Title: Does what it should and starts fast
Reviews.Author: Paul Mahon
Reviews.Content: I like it. It starts fast and is perfectly good for email/facebook/youtube etcIf you are looking to install software and use skype this isnt for you but if you want something with a real keyboard that is light and works perfectly well for normal day to day surfing then this is the machine for you. Runs silent and doesnt heat up, battery life is over a few hours but does seem to vary depending on use.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Maggie Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Bigger than I expected and very user friendly. I haven't gotten to use it very much yet because my boyfriend seems to "need" it to look up stuff. It's great if you just want to use the internet. It's quick to boot up and has a nice key pad. Doesn't have a DVD player so I purchased one but haven't figured out how to make it run together. Wondering if it's even an option.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: Joanne Sumner
Reviews.Content: I am writing this on my chromebook and this suits my needs very well. I'm a "google" person anyway. It is light, easy to set up and use. For major writings I will opt for the desk top computer. But I really LIKE this!

Reviews.Title: A perfect fit!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: If all you need is a nice little browser that has a good battery, good screen (I said good), and you don't want to feel guilty about throwing it around the kitchen while cooking or under the car while replacing a part; well this is it!I got a used one from Amazon (looked more like an open box when I got it) for $180!Even though it was "used" I still got the 100GBs free!  WOOHOO!  Didn't think I would.But really, can be playing my music while clicking on the KB with greasy hands and NOT feel bad at all about it.  If I get a few years out of this thing it will be worth every cent!If you want a computer, buy a computer, not a Chromebook.  BUT!  I also tried running Ubuntu on it from an SD card.  It's a bit laggy (not slow, hard to explain) and you basically have to use an external mouse (it works but not well).  But don't bother with with video from Ubuntu yet, there no HW acceleration but everything else works just fine!  Even Gimp seems to work good.So, Ubuntu is a go and is a good backup for when I am away from the net.Chrome is a go!  GO GO GO GO!  :P  Really, very happy.It's kinda like that little 90HP car that isn't really fast, but it eager to please and a blast to drive.

Reviews.Title: Small, Compact, Perfect
Reviews.Author: T. brown
Reviews.Content: My chromebook is perfect for everything and its a great little device and would highly reccomend it and it is well worth the money

Reviews.Title: Perfect travel laptop for the road
Reviews.Author: Al Carrillo
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung Chromebook to stay online during my one year South American travel.  It is light weight and of excellent quality.  I especially like the keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Great Second Laptop
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: The Chromebook is an incredible device to use as a second laptop or as a portable web browser you can take anywhere but still has a QWERTY keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Best computer EVER
Reviews.Author: quiltz "quilty"
Reviews.Content: this is great very simply for one wanting to access internet and e-mail.  the loading speed is amazing, along with ease of connecting to the 'net while traveling.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Harman
Reviews.Content: Suits all my purposes, lightweight, easy to navigate. Love the app buttons that can be added and just a simple click will open a new screen.

Reviews.Title: very good,
Reviews.Author: wesr coast
Reviews.Content: I found this laptop very helpfull, user friendly, and full of excited about it, plays all of my favorite music, and movie's,

Reviews.Title: Thin fast as hell
Reviews.Author: rcoopa
Reviews.Content: Great little computer super fast, just starting to learn how it works but like it a lot,would buy again if need great price

Reviews.Title: great machine
Reviews.Author: Matt Tyndall
Reviews.Content: So easy to use right out of the box...I got one for my husband for Christmas so he could read news and email.  I liked it so much I got a second one.  Still getting used to Google docs instead of Office but it isn't so bad.  (Never have been able to get my  wireless printer to work with the cloud which is the down side.)  Now that we have Netflix it is even better.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: BRUCE LIMA
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Chromebook was perfect for my needs and desires. The small package makes it very easy to use almost anywhere. It is fast and handles all my requirements from web browsing to investment analysis to email, video viewing and games.USB connectors allow for additional storage and info access. All in this little inexpensive package

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Robert Whitlow
Reviews.Content: Great for my wife's needs, emails, Facebook, browsing, etc. Setup is simple, out of box, onto web.Can't miss for simple needs

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: jk
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a second computer to keep on the kitchen counter for quick reference and checking email.  So far this fits the bill perfectly.  Nice and small, very light.  The set up was super-easy.  I haven not explored the apps much, or used the 3G yet, so can't comment yet on those things.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for general everyday use
Reviews.Author: Arthur Camiel Kesteloot Jr. "Arthur Kesteloot"
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for general everyday use. The auto updates, quick start, and scope of available web applications enables you to do just about everything except heavy video or photo editing.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Cassandra Ang
Reviews.Content: Fast Delivery, awesome product , simple mini laptop. This is my new travel computer for life , mostly just a Internet use laptop, it's like an iPad with a keyboard. But totally in love with it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: William R. Yee "Mr. Curious"
Reviews.Content: I look at my mail, surf the net and write.Light and simple and elegant.Minimalist perfection at the right price.

Reviews.Title: Light weight, fast boot-up, always on, and long lasting battery
Reviews.Author: Lester Thompson
Reviews.Content: Almost immediate start-up upon opening the screen. Very light weight and thin profile. Keyboard has a nice travel, although the keys are quite close. Lacks a 9-key pad, but that is not a limitation. Wireless easily detects signal, and immediately links up. There are inherent limitations with transferring files to the drive, since it is not really a "windows explorer." Would be nice if more "apps" were available for the device. When I called the help desk, they couldn't help because they were only trained on the Android operating system rather than for Chrome. So, no matter what I was asking about Chrome, they would not help.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: It is different to other computers, but it is a great computer, and the price is awesome! Great purchase, I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: The Chromebook is with me always
Reviews.Author: BARBARA Jennings "reader for life"
Reviews.Content: I like the Chromebook because it is lightweight and fits in my purse.  The feature of a USB port for saving files or accessing files that are not in the g drive is great.  Also,  I work in various locations so being able to access printers is a  definite plus for the business person.  The screen and icons are easy to read and use.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook Review
Reviews.Author: Lovele jackson
Reviews.Content: This is a very cute little chromebook, it is very nice. Just not what I anticipated. It's very simple and I was wanting more features and more capabilities. Very nice product. Very good for a college student or someone not going to do too much on it.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: The only reason I didn't give this a 5 star rating is that I am having trouble reading the print. Everything else about this Samsung Chromebook is exactly as advertised. Hopefully, with more investigating, I will resolve the readability issue. As always, Amazon's shipping is fast and dependable!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Paul L Gaudette
Reviews.Content: The only problem we had was that this little bad boy was it only showed us how antiquated the rest of our equipment is!  If we had the money we would buy some more of these.

Reviews.Title: Good Chromebook but drags a bit
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This Chromebook has been reviewed many times. So there not much for me to repeat. I am a Google Fanboy so this is not my first Google device. I love the Chromebook in general so take my review in that light. I actually bought the Samsung 5 550 for my wife. I bought this Chromebook for my mom who is a novice computer user. The keyboard is a bit small for my hands. It has a tendency to delay a bit on some operations e.g. playing video. It lags a bit. I upgraded to the dev channel and GoogleDocs did not open I reset the machine and set it to the stable channel.  The problem was fixed. I was pleased to see how easy it is to recover itself. I ordered the Acer C7 for my daughter.  I like the sleek design and lightness of the device.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook=OK
Reviews.Author: Ashley Bagley
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying it is very nicely designed. The overall look of the chromebook is very nice. I wish that I could do more things on my chromebook though. Either Chrome needs to widen its range of compatibility, or other programs need to make themselves compatiable with chrome. If anyone has any tips on how to use skype and netflix with my chromebook that would be greatly appreciated and I would be willing to give it another star. The battery life is great, it's very slim and sleek as well. I have an all in one HP desktop computer, and a kindle fire so this laptop is for using a computer in bed, and when I travel. :) Thanks for any advice in advance!

Reviews.Title: Chromebook Works as Advertised
Reviews.Author: abc
Reviews.Content: I give this product a five star rating.  It is everything that I hoped for in a small computer.  The price was right and it is very dependable and travel worthy.  I highly recommend it as a supplement to a traditional computer.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: JAG
Reviews.Content: This operating system has a few issues and a learning curve but performs much more economically than Windows for users that do not need all the options that Windows offers.

Reviews.Title: Recieved faulty product.
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: The product itself is wonderful, now only if I didn't receive one that shuts off itself for no reason. Also the power button seems broken when I received it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me!
Reviews.Author: Horse51
Reviews.Content: Love my Chromebook! It is perfect for what I use it for - internet and email. If you're looking for a full functional laptop with all the capabilities then spend the money on one! This little powerhouse powers up instantly when you open the cover, is password protected but my kids can browse on it as a guest. Pages load instantly. It holds a charge for a good 8 hours and charges quickly. I always been a fan of Chrome and I love the size and portability of it. Updates automatically and virus-free, Keyboard is great, mousepad works great. I did get a wireless mouse for when I'll be doing a lot of scrolling and clicking. Haven't looked into tying it into my wireless printer yet but there's a built in tutorial I"ll get to one day. I just use the PC when I want to print something.For the nay sayers out there - I say make sure you understand what you're buying and at this price it's a bargain!

Reviews.Title: my gosh
Reviews.Author: Roberto Scattini
Reviews.Content: this chromebook is AWESOME. i am very happy with this, it works as expected, and you have a lot of poaibilities if you are an experienced user. one of my best technology purchases ever! absolutely recommended!!!

Reviews.Title: I love my Samsung Chromebook!
Reviews.Author: Lisa P
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitate about buying the Samsung Chromebook, but this laptop is super fast. I am totally amazed at the startup and shutdown speed. The apps are amazing, and I have recommended this laptop everyone.

Reviews.Title: Chromebooks FTW
Reviews.Author: Marculus
Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome.  Most people use computers for the internet and this machine is made specifically for it.  Google Drive is getting better all the time and I think it's a good substitute for Office now.Pros: Battery lasts forever, insanely quick boot-up and shut-down times, auto updates direct from Google, very light and portableCons: Performance can lag when watching HD content, screen is adequate,

Reviews.Title: Does What It Says
Reviews.Author: Sherri Etheredge
Reviews.Content: This is an incredible netbook that functions as promised, is easy to navigate and customize, and fits almost anywhere. The only downside is that my college classes require assignments to be turned in using MS Word forcing me to use another computer to turn in class work.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Nick LaCamera
Reviews.Content: I use this as a computer for my living room. As long as you are not expecting much from this computer, it does a great job at browsing the web, displaying web videos (even in HD) and playing flash games. It is even decent at google hangouts. Highly recommended as a secondary computer.

Reviews.Title: Woohoo Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Rosalinda Rosario
Reviews.Content: Great laptop at a great price.  Purchased this laptop for my son and it's just what he wanted and it gets the work done with no problems and it doesn't freeze.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Mark D
Reviews.Content: For a second laptop the Chromebook is great.  It's easy to navigate and quite affordable. Google apps are abundant and easy to load.  Great job Google.

Reviews.Title: Samsung chromebook
Reviews.Author: Michele l Lockwood
Reviews.Content: This is just what we wanted, small and much lighter than the laptop.  I think it sever a little lighter than a ipad

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Gail Ridlon
Reviews.Content: I really love the samsung chromebook, it is small, light weight, the features are great and I would recommend this to friends and family if they was looking for something like this. It does everything that I need it for. I can't say enough good about it so far.

Reviews.Title: Terrible performance - hangs all the time
Reviews.Author: tafuting
Reviews.Content: I am a big Google fan. With my own Google for Business Apps account, files on gdrive, user of Chrome, this should have been an ideal machine for me.Pluses - Light, fits in my purse, quick boot up and shut down, wonderful battery lifeCons - One month into owning the product, I am facing severe performance issues. Gdrive hangs almost every hour, maps.google.com just doesn't work,gmail attachments dont download. My general browsing is no issue, so frankly I am stumped as to why none of the google services work okay. Google has not reported any service outages on these apps, so its not that either.The worst bit is there is no one to call. Samsung has no support, how does one figure if this is a hardware or Google problem!?

Reviews.Title: Like it!
Reviews.Author: Jesus Herrera "Tactical Man"
Reviews.Content: I still learning how to play around with,but i really like it!Great for surfing,chat and all king of socialite in general.I extrongly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Rusty S
Reviews.Content: This is the ideal alternative to a laptop. Easy, light and very functional. I also have an iPad2. These 2 make the perfect traveling companions.

Reviews.Title: little powerhouse
Reviews.Author: ronnie
Reviews.Content: The Samsung chrome book seemed a bit light in the rear at first. But with continued use I find it to stand up well ,as well as any heavier PC might do.time will tell the story on its endurance but as for now, I would recommend this unit to anyone looking for confidence and value.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Kelly Annette Coats
Reviews.Content: It was a great price for this computer.  It does everything that I need it to do and streams movies very well.

Reviews.Title: Compact and great!
Reviews.Author: J. Perkins
Reviews.Content: Ok, this isn't a laptop. It ISN'T going to run programs or do other things that you have come to expect from a major OS. That being said, if you plan to do a lot of work in a browser and in the cloud then this guy is what you are looking for. It gets about 5.5 hours of battery and does exactly what I need it to when I am away from my PCs. I love how portable it is. You will love it! God mine at Best Buy because of the 6 month 0% financing.

Reviews.Title: Great machine!!!
Reviews.Author: ddss
Reviews.Content: Great machine and so easy to use! This is how computer should be. Just start and go. No updates and no hassle.

Reviews.Title: It is great for most things
Reviews.Author: jlsisson1
Reviews.Content: I like most everything about it except it is hard to connect with blue toothI bought one for my son and he loves his

Reviews.Title: hooking up
Reviews.Author: jane siepman
Reviews.Content: I had problems getting the internet to load i had to have our internet carrier come and take the password off and it loaded fine

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook Review
Reviews.Author: Herbert Gibson
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this product very much. I recommend this to consumers who travel or go to school. It is durable and lightweight. Ideal for students.Remmy

Reviews.Title: My laptop is gathering dust
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Buyer"
Reviews.Content: At work, I need a powerful PC to do my job. But at home I surf the web, check emails, and do some writing. The Chromebook fully satisfies my home computing needs. And it's fast. Really fast. Open the cover and it's there, ready to to launch whatever app I need. I got the 3G version for my mom as a replacement for the on-contract netbook she'd been using.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product!
Reviews.Author: Jose Luiz Galego Jr.
Reviews.Content: This little computer does everything you really need to do!Perfect for travel! Lightweight, 4 to 5 hours of Wi-Fi surfing.And it is cheaper than some "warranty" of the other companies.It is very secure too, everything goes to the cloud.You earn 100 GB of Google Drive, and a lot of Wi-Fi in flight. It pays back.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Billy Wilson
Reviews.Content: This little thing does everything I want it to do at a great price. It's fast and giving me long battery life. Sounds pretty good and I just can't find anything bad to say about it. What a deal.

Reviews.Title: satisfied with Samsung chromebook
Reviews.Author: Woodcat
Reviews.Content: I have not used it daily, but am happy with the speed of start up.  Sometimes it freezes but will be OK after restart. It is very convenient to use

Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Mike B
Reviews.Content: I love the fast start up and the fact that I don't have to update the virus protections or the software. The Chromebook is my preferred platform for web reading. It also is surprisingly powerful with the Google capabilities that it provides and the apps that are available.My only disappointment is the fact that it does not have the full featured Picassa software available. If it did I would ditch my laptop because the Chromebook is lighter to carry and works so effortlessly.

Reviews.Title: Downsizing from 17in HP
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's simple to use and the Google environment is evolving into a comprehensive replacement for Windows and Mac. That I like. But what I don't like is the fact Chromebook nor I, understand how to configure a USB mic, being used for karaoke, going to and extended screen via HDMI. Simple control panel change in Windows, but no control panel on Chrome. If I could get this to work I'd give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING! DONT WASTE YOU MONEY ON A MAC BOOK AIR
Reviews.Author: Daniel H. Sasse
Reviews.Content: I SAVED $800 IT BOOTS RIGHT UP. HAS A GREAT LONG LASTING BATTERY. NICE KEYBOARD. NICE SPEAKERS. NICE WEBCAM WHAT MORE COULD ONE NEED?

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed.....
Reviews.Author: Stop Propaganda
Reviews.Content: GREAT value for the money.....works well, display is awesome, operating system works well. I don't know how thay can do it at this price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Joy E. Nelson "guarddog76310"
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone. $250.00 is a good price to pay. It does have limited features, but does what it was advertised to do.

Reviews.Title: Best thing out there for the price
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: this thing is awesome, it works just fine for my daily needs.  Great price, can't be beat. I Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great computer, disappointing build
Reviews.Author: Luke Tsai
Reviews.Content: The mouse doesnt work as well as i'd like, and the back hinge popped open. the build is weak and flimsy. however, the computer works well for 95% of my situations and is nice and lightweight. The other 5% i can use the built in remote desktop to use a windows pc from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: Love the Chromebook...works well as a second computer to the desk top,  It's very user friendly and extremely intuitive.  I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: George D. Saunders
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for, light weight travel computer for the internet & emails.I really like the instant on feature

Reviews.Title: Its a good notebook for the 4 days it worked.
Reviews.Author: gamer
Reviews.Content: Everything was awesome with with notebook, perfect size  , starts up fast as heck from a cold start, looks good  has all the features, but all the sudden mine just shut off-...  and  a white light  blinked, i tried messing with the power cable and differnt oulets ect. but no luck , so good luck if u get one , looks like you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Tiffani Wallace
Reviews.Content: This has been one of my best purchases ever!!  Small, lightweight and I can do everything I need on it!!  Just a ya bigger than my iPad.  Boots in seconds.

Reviews.Title: Working well
Reviews.Author: yolie contreras
Reviews.Content: I am not an expert by any means. I bought this to supplement my desktop computer. I think it does the job fine. Gets great battery life. So far I don't have any major complaints.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Thomas Smyrl
Reviews.Content: This is a good product for the money, needs a little better instruction manual, it is all it says and probably more

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Edward J. Barton
Reviews.Content: I use the Chromebook all the time at home, and when I am looking to surf the web or do relatively light computing. It has an amazing battery life, and the need to be connected to WiFi isn't that big a deal - there are hot spots nearly everywhere you go, and I also have a mobile WiFi hot spot from my phone provider. While limited apps and lack of internal storage and a thin OS limits the usefulness of the Chromebook, the use of the cloud computing resources from Google, coupled with the very low cost, makes this a good value and worth picking up as a second machine.

Reviews.Title: Nice Light  Book
Reviews.Author: radioguy
Reviews.Content: Works great and has bright screen and 6hr batteryVery portable and easy to useDisplayis nice size Like the Chrome Color

Reviews.Title: my chromebook
Reviews.Author: GEORGE W. MILLER SR.
Reviews.Content: this has been pleasant surprize-after tablets this is beautiful-love contents & setup,size & overall look-usually dont or try not 2 buy foreign products but could not pass on the $249.00 cost-free ship-no complaints :) will see how it works w/printer coming 4 it

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Moya
Reviews.Content: I just recently purchased this laptop...and I must say that I am quite satisfied...only disappointment would be that it has no place for cds or dvds...but as far as I'm concerned there are more positives than negatives...definitely glad I purchased this...can type up documents on this as well as put together power point presentations if need be...has a web cam...is not big, but it is very sleek...I give it two thumbs...

Reviews.Title: Great Notebook
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I truly believe this is a great notebook with many great aspects, I just wish there were apps that you could access while offline and my rating for this would grow even larger once Chrome OS gets to that point which I'm sure in the future they will...haven't had it for very long but i do love it very much so far and DEFINITELY love the price!!!

Reviews.Title: chromebook
Reviews.Author: josephine gonzalez
Reviews.Content: this laptop is the exact size of this picture and my son loves this product.  The words you can seeand its worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Great family computer
Reviews.Author: Jeff Sullivan
Reviews.Content: We got this computer mostly so our kids could have easy access to a computer when desired, but it takes up no space when we aren't using it. It is wonderful for email and anything web-based, which is the vast majority of our computer needs. I even did my taxes on it this year (TurboTax online).

Reviews.Title: Super User-Friendly
Reviews.Author: Danielle Slapak
Reviews.Content: We had to replace my mom's old netbook since it was too slow, and ordered the Chromebook for her.  The price was perfect and everything she needs in a computer. She's not very tech-savvy, so it's very user-friendly for her and she loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great for surfing the web
Reviews.Author: average joe
Reviews.Content: Bought for my 9 year old daughter.  She loves it.  Great for surfing web and perfect size for her.  We also have a macbook air 11" for my wife.  Amazing the similarities considering the price difference.  Would not recommend if you need to do a lot of editing in MS Office style formats.  Only options are google docs (decent) or Open Docs (haven't used it).

Reviews.Title: Good deal!!
Reviews.Author: William Pimentel
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our computor purchase.It was well worth the price and I would buy another one in a heart beat if I needed one, thank you agin!!

Reviews.Title: Performance is a bit choppy, but a good value
Reviews.Author: Chris L. Burton "dogmaphobic"
Reviews.Content: For casual surfing this is a great value. Wouldn't want to do a lot of work on it, but if you cringe at paying over a thousand bucks for a MB Air, then this might be for you. Lightweight and stays cool on your lap. Stays connected to my home network. There are even some useful apps for it, like an SSH terminal window.

Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased the Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: The Chromebook is ideal for me. I love the start up speed! The size is just right as well. I find it very useful when my children need to use our home computer(s). I have explored the apps but have not found many which meet my current needs. Still exploring this however.

Reviews.Title: A very good web based computer
Reviews.Author: G. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Offers an amazing amount for the dollar. We are getting two to three hours battery life when on the web and double that when working offline. Unit is not really off so it starts very fast but that may be why we don't get better battery life.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Asyets
Reviews.Content: required some getting use to but works fine. easy  to use. Needs more programs or apps which will come in the future

Reviews.Title: Got it for my very unsavvy hubby, & he can even use it...
Reviews.Author: clpinsky31
Reviews.Content: Great gift for someone who just wants to do games, Facebook, etc....so far we are totally pleased with the product & especially the reasonable price........

Reviews.Title: Great product overall!!
Reviews.Author: T. E. Hale "thale"
Reviews.Content: I'd *definitely* recommend the chromebook!  Super easy to use seconds after opening the box.  Chrome Web Store has a zillion free apps that I've already taken advantage of.  I can also download some things to the Chrome book which I didn't expect to be able to do.  (I thought all files had to go immediately to my Google Drive but they don't.)  Amazing power and portability for a super price.The only thing I've been unsatisfied with is that the computer will occasionally  reboot itself (which only takes a couple of seconds) randomly as far as I can tell.  But since I have Chrome settings set to "when starting continue where I left off", I go right back to what I was doing.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Albert Redwood
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. I was not expecting that it was so light and powerful. It's easy to set up. Great start computer for the one who has no idea how the work a computer! No cd/DVD/blu-ray, but i think that's a waste of space with everything being cloud base:-)

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Mvyer
Reviews.Content: It was the right size. Didn't want one too large. Using for internet mail and searches. Perfect. I'd recommend it highly

Reviews.Title: A great surfing notebook
Reviews.Author: Vinyl Eddy "Andrew - Vinyl Eddys"
Reviews.Content: It's not a full-fledge notebook but that's not why you get it. If you want to surf the web and a tablet isn't quite cutting it for you, this Chromebook is the way to go. Two-finger scrolling seals the deal.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Jessparado
Reviews.Content: This machine has me impressed with both Samsung and Google. It feels really quick for a $250 laptop and is very quiet. It was a little strange navigating the Chrome OS at first, but after about 10 minutes and a surprisingly helpful tutorial I was flying around pretty well. It should be said that I am fairly familiar with most of the Google apps and the Chrome browser. My 63 year old mother, however, is not. But, most of the apps are super simple to use and I have not received a single tech support question.

Reviews.Title: Suits most needs
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: this is an excellent little laptop with capabilities for almost every daily need. It is true that if you need aspps beyond what Google offers in the cloud, like running your scanner, you are not going to completely stop using your Windows or Mac. But this is really handy for typing messages, cruising the internet, streaming music, movies or sports, etc. It is better than any tablet for daily at home needs, and we love our 3 tablets so we can speak with authority on this.

Reviews.Title: What a great gift, and now I want one!
Reviews.Author: A Clark "Auriella"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my husband who seems to use it every single day. Today I found him walking out of the bathroom with it!I have had the opportunity to use it exactly 1 time, because he doesn't seem to leave it out of his sight. It is very lightweight, and the internet works great! I enjoyed the functionality of the trackpad, the ability to double tap lightly as well as click it like a mouse is a great plus to me. I am heavily considering buying another one, but the only thing that is stopping me is that I already have so many electronic devices including a laptop and a kindle fire so I'm not sure what I would really use it for other than having something else to play with.

Reviews.Title: Great Investment
Reviews.Author: Allan Gottlieb
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the product. Boots up much faster than my Acer tab, about half the price, about the same size, great keyboard. Like the tight integration with online Google apps and Google Drive.

Reviews.Title: like my cromebook
Reviews.Author: Linda Ciampa "Linda Sue"
Reviews.Content: easy to use - love the size of the keyboard. the book is lightweight and easy to carry. i am still learning about all the things it does.  also like watching tv on it at night in bed while going to sleep.  just set it in the night stand,

Reviews.Title: Where has this been all my life!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: utahmike
Reviews.Content: Very easy to learn how to operate.  Chrome store has all the apps/elements this 64 year old needs.Wanted something to replace my small HP netbook.  Got what I wanted plus more..........large keyboard, super fast, great screen size, etc.  Super happy with purchase.  My wife is eyeing the Chromebook to replace her iPad.The only thing I need now is a Wi-Fi enabled printer so I can print from this Chromebook.One limitation is I can't see any Amazon downloads of purchase histories (.cvs or .csv files).  However, for my purposes I can live with it.Oh, I am now an Angry Bird fan.Would recommend this to anyone who is looking for the same as I.I plugged in my USB and it comes up right away when I open the lid on the Chromebook.

Reviews.Title: Great netbook (a real thin-client device)
Reviews.Author: Michael Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a great internet book with plenty of capability. As I would expect on an inexpensive device like this, the video playback has some non-smoothness (probably limited graphics processor), but is not horrible.It's so quick and simple to use. 1) open. 2) (blink) oh, it's already on. 3) use.I love the price. I like the connectivity. I struggled a little with one of the people that used it in explaining that you can't install typical applications. Everything has to be a Chrome plug-in or a web application.On the geeky side, it even has a limited Chrome Shell (crosh) for ping, tracepath, and a few other console commands. I haven't learned yet how to discover IP address (LAN IP before firewall).

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop at a great price!
Reviews.Author: K. Wolfe "eaglesfan1234"
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect ultraportable laptop on the market. I bought it as sort of a secondary laptop; something that could do basic word processing, internet browsing, video-playing, etc. This laptop not only met my expectations, it exceeded them. This laptop quickly became my "go to" laptop, while my "real" laptop only gets taken out for specific purposes (when I need to play a CD or run Windows-only software). The laptop is very quick thanks to its flash only memory and lightweight OS and while some buyers may be concerned about its lack of a "real" processor, it has not hiccuped in my every day use at all. The laptop is very aesthetically pleasing and takes many design cues from Apple's Macbook Air. It is very sturdy and feels "dense and significant" despite its  extremely light weight.The only drawback I've found so far is that in stead of a Caps-Lock button, there is a "search" button. This is particularly a problem for me because I am one of the (apparently) few people who use the Caps-Lock instead of the shift button. However, it is  especially a problem because the search button interrupts my typing when I forget to use the shift key. In fact, I've done it several times during this review. This may not be a problem for most people, but its worth pointing out in case anyone is like me.All in all, this is a great device. When I purchased it, I was concerned that I would find the relatively stripped functionality to be a problem, but its been a great laptop that I look forward to using for a long time.

Reviews.Title: For my wife.
Reviews.Author: Gene Signoretti
Reviews.Content: I have a desktop and I bought my wife a Kindle Fire.  She loves the Kindle but hates going to my basement office to use the desktop.  She saw this and we ordered it.  She absolutely loves this.  It connected to my WiFi without a hitch and works perfectly.  I am waiting for some patches from Netflix and Optimum for video.  Other than that, this is one sleek design.  It looks feels and works like a charm.  It is light and super thin.  The screen size is fine, very clear, and the keyboard has a nice feel.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Sofa Laptop
Reviews.Author: B. Elliott "HappyCampers"
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality and simple to use.  Plenty of Google Apps to make this a realistic tool for the non-power user.  Light, cool, and quiet claims are all accurate.  Sized like a large tablet, but with a full size keyboard.  Good screen resolution and fast operating speed.

Reviews.Title: I think it is a gem.
Reviews.Author: charles
Reviews.Content: The quality of this little jewel exceeds my expectations. The build is better than many more expensive laptops. After having many laptops in my life, there is something to the "feel" of it that I really appreciate. I think it is a gem.

Reviews.Title: Chromebook
Reviews.Author: OAL
Reviews.Content: Just what my grandson wanted.  Thanks for the quick shipment. Thanks so much for your response to my request.  He has enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: I am going to order another one for me this time
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Its a bit different, but I am showing the wife how to use it. Still need a mouse, I guess I we are little old school. Not all will work, must be Samsung or Chrome.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Saif Q
Reviews.Content: Shortly:Pros:Cheap, Good Quality, light, long battery duration, you can buy 4 of these with the price of one Mac Air!Simple Operating system get to do most of what you do: even downloading music and editing mp3s (yes there are apps for that!). works well with external devices (Hard disks, Android phones).Cons:try to open less tabs (reloads old tabs).Chrome OS helps you doing most of what you do but not all of it: no skype, no exe applications.

Reviews.Title: Great portable device
Reviews.Author: william d sherry
Reviews.Content: One of the better of the new generation of netbooks.  Compact[ 11.6" screen, light, very easy to carry.  Excellent .choice as a backup computer.  Fast, clean setup and very easy to use.  Now for the bad news--- if you plan to stream videos or use it as an e-reader, you might want to search elsewhere as the screen does not offer the sharpest picture that I have seen, and it is also necessary to tilt this chromebook in order to get the best viewing angle. Another thought; at $249, this was a great deal.  I see now where the retail price is slowly creeping above $300.  Might want to think about that, as there are some pretty good items out there in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Good "value" product
Reviews.Author: Aaron L. Silvas
Reviews.Content: Excellent product for the cost, performs well, and "just works". Just wish the screen was a lot better, the quality and resolution are poor. It's good enough for most web browsing though.

Reviews.Title: Speedy. long battery life, as advertized
Reviews.Author: R. A. Cantrell "R. A. Cantrell"
Reviews.Content: I can't figure out how to get to the "properties" of the computer and I don't like being told how many characters to voluntarily submit

Reviews.Title: so far awsome
Reviews.Author: lubcheen
Reviews.Content: holds a decent charge and does what I need it for. I use it  while watching tv to surf the webb.

Reviews.Title: Great little notebook
Reviews.Author: Toni Morgan
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend this chromebook, for anyone. I am able to do everything I want to do with this machine and more..

Reviews.Title: The Samsung Chromebook rocks!
Reviews.Author: Anedra Davis "Anedra D."
Reviews.Content: The Chromebook is a wonderfully light and perfect travel companion, great for mostly web surfers that may or may not take advantage of the numerous available extras.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brian Amir
Reviews.Content: It came on the expected day and was ready for use right there and than. The product is also very rewarding for its price. Limited in versatility it takes some time to get used to its functions, but after that there are almost no restrictions compared to a normal computer

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Lisa A.
Reviews.Content: We purchased this item for our teenage daughter and she absolutely loves it!  It is so easy to use and very quick on start-up.  We highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: awesome laptop
Reviews.Author: blackstars
Reviews.Content: Great price. Great laptop. Definitely a must have!!!!! Bought it for my 13 yr old daughter and she loves it. It is a great laptop for a first time owner.

Reviews.Title: QUICK SERVICE
Reviews.Author: jim pierce
Reviews.Content: I received my Chromebook quicker that was told, so I was very happy about that. I'm going to order the book on it so I can become more familiar with it. I was wondering, that did it come with a CD< or DVD? There wasn't one in my box. Could you check into this matter? Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: CC
Reviews.Content: I am very, very happy with my Samsung Google Chromebook. It is fast, lightweight, cool, and stylish. For surfing the Internet it has everything I need. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: great comp
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: works perfect for now. simple. fast. light. plastic is kind of thin but does the trick for me here@ woo

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jesse Honigberg "jessedh"
Reviews.Content: This is an unbelievable value.  The matte screen is great, it is super light and with the right Chrome extensions, you can impersonate nearly any browser (useful for work OWA).  I find myself just traveling with this and my iPad (which I setup as a hotspot)Having a nice, physical keyboard is a huge bonus too, especially when banging out long emails or notes.  Google integration is well done, and since I have owned it, Google has pushed out 3 ChromeOS updates.Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: Vickie A Stanaback
Reviews.Content: This was a xmas present for my husband.  He said it is simple to use once you get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy about games
Reviews.Author: Mary Jane
Reviews.Content: I really like my new Samsung Chromebook except for the fact that you cannot play some games on it.  Like for instance Farmville 2 will not load on it.  I even went to Zynga, who makes the game for help & no matter what they tell me to do, it still will not load.  There are a couple other games that will not load either. :(  I bought this for the convenience of having a 2nd computer in order to play games.  Other than that, I can send emails & surf the net just fine.  Wondering if anyone else has the issue with games?

Reviews.Title: Really nice machine!
Reviews.Author: Mark F. Noble
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a second computer primarily for my wife who is computer averse, but she is really enjoying it.  It has preformed so far as advertised and as being easy to use.  We have yet to put it to the acid test.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Larry Bailey
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a christmas gift it got here early.  Extreme props for Amazon you guys are the best.  The chromebook is fast and easy to use.  only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because so far you can't add anything to the desktop almost everything is Internet based.  Still all in all she has not even picked up her old heavy loud laptop.  chromebook+amazon= Priceless  : )

Reviews.Title: Useful!
Reviews.Author: Cjdevincentis
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for a casual Internet browsing user. Nothing super fancy; just the basics. I call it "a tablet in laptop form".

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Qaeed Nuriddin
Reviews.Content: The chromebook is exactly as advertised. A web based, cloud storage system. The only downside Ive experienced so far would have to be the lack of support from a few of my major android app makers. Google hasnt worked out a deal w/ Netflix yet, along w/ very popular android games and productivity apps. No ESPN fantasy football, Fifth Third bank, etc. So I just end up going online instead of to an app. BRING NETFLIX!!!!

Reviews.Title: Chromebook for my mom!
Reviews.Author: happy squirrel
Reviews.Content: Based on an Amazon review, I purchased the Chromebook for my computer illiterate 84-year-old mother....and she's doing remarkably well with it!  The 'help' available for the Chromebook is very complete, and set up was instantaneous!  I've used the 'Ninja' help twice, and they answered my emails very quickly, and provided the information needed in the response!The Chromebook is a quick, fun little machine...my mom loves being able to 'talk' to Google when searching!The only complaint I have is the missing 'delete' button...but that's only because I'm used to using a delete button.  My mom doesn't know the difference...she's learning to use the 'backspace' button.

Reviews.Title: Really nice
Reviews.Author: pcampbellk
Reviews.Content: Bought for my son who is 13 and its perfect for him.  Very light, compact and easy to use.  Quality seems good so far

Reviews.Title: Consumer ready in 2013
Reviews.Author: Monty "Tech Trainer"
Reviews.Content: The minimalism design of this simple product takes a little time to get acclimated to. It does one thing extremely well: web browsing. It is perfect for someone who needs a zero maintenance device to surf web pages, or for an IT professional. I think that in a few more releases, Chrome OS will be more consumer friendly; it isn't finished/ready for a non-techie. But in a year I'll probably buy these for the whole family - not as an all-in-one solution, but as a device specialized for web browsing. That's a good thing at this weight and price!

Reviews.Title: have had it about a month an happy
Reviews.Author: Michael Marrocco
Reviews.Content: Main thing I don't know why the bluetooth will NOT stream music to a speaker!!!! one main reason I bought it. Hopefully they will add this in a future update.  Other than that, getting used to it but love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice For a First Computer
Reviews.Author: Shelly L. Duffer
Reviews.Content: This is actually my first laptop. My mother got it for me for Christmas(I am using her account to write this), after I was saving up for it for 6 months. I did not figure that mom would get it for me, so I chose the cheapest but best quality laptop I could find. This seemed perfect for me, considering that I usually only use the internet on the family computer. I looked forward to all the features that this computer held. It seemed perfect. Now, after trying it, my first impression is that it is not as good as I imagined it, but for a first laptop, it does not disappoint.  The Chromebook is very small and lightweight, making it easy to carry around. The design is very sleek and modern, with very nice color, if a bit dull. I am considering buying a skin for it, but if not, it is still very nice. The keyboard is amazing. The keys are just far enough away to make it easy to type. There are a few downsides, though. For one thing, there is no caps lock. It is slightly unnerving, since I am used to it being where the search button is now. I am sure I will get used to it after a while. The only other problem is one of my keys, the "W", does not work well. It keeps getting stuck. I am pretty sure that is not for all the Chromebooks, though. Other than those problems, the keyboard manages to hold up to it's expectations. I was a bit confused about where the charger hole was. It and the audio jack are very similar looking, but the charger hole is smaller and on the back. After only a little time, the computer started getting warm, but not too terribly. In fact, it is quite nice for the winter. Overall, the design seemed to be nearly as I hoped it would be, just with a couple small problems.  Setup was much simpler than I thought that it would be. You just have to connect to your internet and log into Google. The update took a bit, but that was expected. It was ready within minutes, and I did not have to get help from anyone else (like I usually do, not being very tech savvy). This was very nice. The getting started page that comes up once you finish setting it up was very helpful, and quickly taught me the basics of the Chromebook.  I have not tried out all the apps, but the ones I have tried seem to work well. The camera is very nice, although I wish that you were able to make videos. However, when you save a picture from the camera into the file app, it is unable to open it. Apparently, I need to get an app that can open the picture. I looked online, and am unable to find such app. If you know what app I need, please tell me, so that I can actually open pictures from the camera app. Other apps I used included Google documents, calculator, and scratchpad. All seem to work fine.  Internet has no large problems apart from the inability to use Netflix. Everything seems to work quickly and nicely. Sound and screen are okay, but not amazing. I have seen better, but I have seen way worse. Battery life seems to be nice.  So all in all, my first impression is that it does nicely for a first computer, or maybe as a secondary computer. I will post more as time goes on and I explore more.

Reviews.Title: Great travel computer
Reviews.Author: Wk18
Reviews.Content: I wanted something light and easy to use and for a good price.  I got all of it with this.  I'm very happy with this product.  The battery life is pretty good and surfing the net and checking email.  Doesn't hurt that I use a lot of Google products already.  Definitely a good deal and great way to be productive on the go.

Reviews.Title: Painfully slow.
Reviews.Author: gretchw
Reviews.Content: Painfully slow.This chromebook is PAINFULLY slow. It is really only useful for typing and basic web browsing... but you can't even play youtube/netflix videos on it because the video card can't keep up with the frame rate.I would NOT recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Everything is great...but no Netflix!!!
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with the functionality, speed, and ease of use with the new Chromebook. However, I think that I can speak for a huge majority of consumers that not being able to use Netflix is a huge deal breaker. If I had known, I wouldn't have bought it. I believe Google is working to fix this (they say that they have already fixed it, but my most recent update still will not allow me to use Netflix). I would have thought that this product would not have launched with such a critical unresolved problem. I also am discovering that Google does not have any traditional form of customer service outlets. All I was able to do was fill in an online form to a customer service "ninja", but as of yet I have not received a response. I would give the Chromebook 4.5 Stars if I could watch Netflix... 5 Stars if I was able to talk to one of their "ninjas" without waiting so long.I received the following error message:"Dear Chrome OS Device user,Streaming is not currently supported on your device. We're working with Google to ensure that all Chrome OS users can instantly watch TV shows and movies from Netflix. More details to be announced soon."

Reviews.Title: Quality refurb - some great features but some annoyances
Reviews.Author: Nxp
Reviews.Content: Refurb is like new.  Pros: Unit looks great, especially with opaque custom cover also available on Amazon.  Unit is light and has good battery life.  Very fast boot time - no annoying upgrades.  Cons: Keyboard lacks a few common keys, notably pg up, pg dn and delete.  Memory card sticks halfway out of case when inserted which makes it tough to just leave it there.  No VGA output jack.  Very thin pin on power cord that may not stand up to abuse.  All of those annoyances are not present on the cheaper brand but battery life is better on this unit.  Chromebook OS is not 100% compatible with logmein remote software which I find to be most unfortunate.

Reviews.Title: Cannot connect to the network
Reviews.Author: unhappy
Reviews.Content: After wasting hours trying to get this new computer up and running I have hit a dead end.A screen opens that allows you to select the language that you want to use and what type of keyboard layout that you prefer.A third option asks you to "Select a network" but when the drop down menu opens, there is just the same list of languages shown in the "Select a language" drop down menu.There are no network options to select from.I am using the same  router with  another computer, a printer, and a Kindle so I know it is working.The Samsung Chromebook does not come with an owners manual and the online help from Google and Samsung is useless for this problem. I am just told to contact my internet provider who tells me to reboot my router and modem.  That didn't help either.  Right now I am out the money spent and cannot use the thing.  I emailed the problem and got an answer back to check the icon on the bottom of the screen to see if internet access is turned on.  How can I do that if I can't get past the setup screen?  There are no icons yet.Update.  I got my new Chrombook today and it was doing the same thing as the first one.  I called 1-800-samsung and got a different consultant.  Turns out the problem is the way the mouse works.  I feel pretty stupid, but from reading the other reviews I find I'm not alone.  The booklet that comes with the netbook doesn't tell you that to left click, you push the mouse down with one finger and to right click, you push the mouse down with 2 fingers.  I was using the mouse to move the curser and pressing the enter key, thinking I was doing a left click.  I am now setup so I can give it to my son for Christmas.  Don't have enought experience to give it a higher review, but I am raising it from a one to a three because it works, but the instructions need work.  Not everyone who buys it knows how to use the mouse so instructions in the booklet and when speaking to a consultant should be more detailed.

Reviews.Title: Never buy a Chromebook from Samsung
Reviews.Author: Coach Likes it
Reviews.Content: The warranty is a joke. The commercials show a child walking on it on the floor so I bought it thinking it was tough. A month after we had it a small crack appeared in the upper right corner. I am still not sure how this happened. When I contacted Samsung it was not covered and it was $200 to fix. I am shopping for another computer and I would never buy a Chromebook again.

Reviews.Title: touch pad broke, poor flash support
Reviews.Author: RickJS
Reviews.Content: I had really high hopes for this as a perfect way for surfing and email stuff.  Even though the description says flash support, we found several popular sites using flash video that didn't work.  At week 3, the touch pad became erratic and was almost impossible to move the cursor around.  Sadly, i'm returning the unit

Reviews.Title: Amazing within reason.
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Holy crap I love my Chromebook. I have a laptop, desktop, tablet and smartphone, and aside from the smartphone, the Chromebook gets by far the most use. Especially now that they have added Netflix support. The keyboard is great (I use it to take notes as a biology student) and the matte screen is wonderful for outdoor usage. The battery life is also a huge plus.The only real con is the touchpad. It is sometimes finicky and the front edge of the system is so thin, that if you grab it from the bottom you can actually accidentally click the touchpad. Grab it from the side or back and you won't have this issue.

Reviews.Title: Good little machine
Reviews.Author: Tara Potter
Reviews.Content: This is a great, lightweight, user-friendly little computer. I purchased it for my oldest son as a gift for his high school graduation. He enjoys it and finds the speed and ease of use to be very accessible.It does have "limiting" factors - because it is a Google product, it is compatible only with Google apps and programs. It is also built to be compact, so if you need a big screen, or a disc drive, you won't find that here.It is a great value for the price, though, and it's portability, battery life, 3G + WiFi, and out-of-the-box start up make it a good machine for a student. Overall, we are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great for students
Reviews.Author: Trevor
Reviews.Content: I bought the Chromebook primarily for doing note taking in class since my old laptop is bulky and has a horrible battery life. Love the long battery life this thing has. Only real complaints I have is the keyboard and the Google Drive 100 GB offer. The keyboard feels like it's cheap and going to break any second. My other complaint is that Google won't give the 100GB chromebook storage offer to this particular Chromebook for whatever reason. I was hoping to have the storage for this since it's so small but now I'm going to have to use flash drives and NAS storage. Other than that though, it's been great. Oh and if you're a Linux power user, don't try to get SteamOS on this thing like I did. It's never going to happen unfortunately.EDIT: Turns out their Google Drive redemption thing was just not working correctly, I got it.EDIT 2: After a few months the space bar seems to be going. It doesn't feel like it was when I first got the chromebook, now it feels like I'm pressing against a firm plastic thing.EDIT 3: Now one of the speakers is behaving strangely. Now when it's too loud it vibrates the plastic itself making this horrible sound. It's solved by lowering the volume or holding down the side with the speaker but it's kinda sad that it's just starting to do this for really no real reason.EDIT 4 5/26/2014: Now the door for the SD card bay just broke for no reason. I've only used it once so it's not like the hinge gave out. I'm now giving this two stars. Really disappointed in Samsung for all the shortcuts they've taken with this. Get the Acer C7 instead.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed!
Reviews.Author: Carl E. Cordell Jr.
Reviews.Content: First, know what you are purchasing.  The Chromebook is a very quick and efficient way to get online quickly.  Think tablet with a keyboard.  Now for the huge bonus to the Chromebook.  You will not have issues with incompatible video formats because they are not supported by mobile.  You are really considered as a laptop so you can access all the same things.  The device is light, easy, fast and prices very well.  If you use Google gmail, docs and other services, they are all ready to go.  Want something different, go to any online site and use their service.  Another great feature is the guest option.  If someone wants to get online real quick, just hand them the chromebook and click guest.  A browser is launched and they are browsing privately with no setup.  There is also a multi port that allows me to upload photos and files from all the different memory cards I have.  You can also connect directly to your high def TV using the HDMI jack on the back.  This is the best purchase I've made in many years.  It was just going to be a short term solution for us but now we have converted to Chromebook users.  No virus problems, 6 seconds to boot, mobile, light... or, and the setup is just open the top and log into your account.  There are a few setup steps to review your options and you are up and running.  I could send this to my grandmother with no instructions and she could use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: Does everything it advertises it can due perfectly and quickly. The chromebook sets up in less a minute almost and is immediately ready to go. Boot time from shut down is so quick. Boot time from sleep mode is instantly. Spotify, Netflix, Hulu, Youtube (even 1080p) work perfect. Google Drive (docs) is a good replacement of MS Office.  Media player supports external video files from flash drives or external hds very nice.  The one thing it does not support is mkv files. But handbrake on my primary windows desktop can convert those easily. Google Chrome Remote Desktop is a very cool app supported on this chromebook.

Reviews.Title: LET DOWN
Reviews.Author: CONASAUGA
Reviews.Content: This is my second Chromebook. The idea appeals to me because I have Google deeply integrated into my work life. I wanted to like this version but wish I could send it back. The first Chromebook I bought was a Samsung 12.5" with an Atom processor. The same problem plagued that model as the newer version. Its too slow and the system strains under any load beyond the most basic work. In reference to the newer Samsung, one reviewer said that video runs fine as long as its less than 1080P. I find any video viewing to be irritating to deal with because it is so slow to start. The same reviewer wrote you could open 6 tabs at the same time without degrading performance. I have not found that to be true. The track pad is better on the new model than the old one but still falls short in smooth and accurate performance. I like the keyboard on both models except for the the lack of a forward erasure key. From a layman's perspective it seems to me this unit would profit greatly from a better processor and/or more memory. Perhaps that would require a fan. I think consumers interested in this concept would pay another $100 if it worked properly. The result is this is another Chromebook that misses the mark. I understand the Pixel Model addresses most or all these problems but at its price I would opt for a Macbook Air.

Reviews.Title: Very good Value
Reviews.Author: Anna Mouzourides
Reviews.Content: I chose this item as I wanted something good to travel with.I know from experience that Samsung are good on Electronics.I would recommend this product to anyone who wanted a good laptop  to use for any occasionThis product matched my expectations fullyI use it for every thing I need

Reviews.Title: Loving this device!
Reviews.Author: Mason J.
Reviews.Content: I'm someone who edits videos, plays games and does a lot of nerdy-computer-esque things.  I use this chromebook all the time.  I don't use it as a replacement for my normal computer and laptop, I just use it for everything I can use it for, which is actually a lot.Where this really excels is in school, I used this in High School in my senior year for essays, note taking, ect.  It's small size and great battery life made it perfect for this.  Now that I'm in college, I use it for exactly the same things.  I use it around the house for things like Amazon, Google+, Imgur and just normal browsing.Whenever I need to do anything excessive, I use one of my other computers.The only real gripe I have about the Chromebook is a HTML5 bug(can be fixed with update) and the fact that I cant play AirMech because of a Native Client issue.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Voided Warranty
Reviews.Author: dbrown7792
Reviews.Content: This chromebook is nice, lightweight and compact. I enjoyed it for the few months that it worked. Unfortunately, within 5 months of purchase the screen started acting up. At first it was a few lines covering part of the screen and then within a couple days over half the screen had lines or was black.  I called the Samsung support and they told me because it was still under warranty I could send it in to be repaired and the only cost to me would be the cost of postage.  After spending $20 to send it, I was informed 2 weeks later that the warranty has been voided because of the "cracked" screen.  I called and tried to explain that I did not drop nor damage the chromebook in any way; however, Samsung refused to fix the issue for me. Waste of money and time! I will NEVER purchase a Samsung product again!

Reviews.Title: It's fast, light, portable, works great except....not for people who use large images, photographers.
Reviews.Author: T. Vena
Reviews.Content: First I want to say that I really wanted to love this machine and I do love most things about it.  It's very fast, boots up quickly, surfs the internet quick, never locks up, etc.However, I have a DSLR and I love to take photos of my family and nature, I am not a professional photographer.  I mostly used web based editing so that wasn't the big issue.  I did not like not being able to edit without going online though.  The Chromebook does come with a basic image editor, and it works ok, WHEN you can get it to work.  If I attempt to put more than 5 large image files and edit them the computer slows down dramatically.  It's even worse when you are attempting to edit and save either from an external hard drive or to the cloud.  The machine just does not handle large files well, it's very slow just even showing you the preview of the images before even attempting to open or edit them.So, my husband will getting this machine because it will be perfect for him since he does not edit photos and mainly watches movies or surfs the internet and I will be getting his old machine where I can run Picasa and open/edit images easily.So if you have a DSLR and think you are going to be doing light editing on this machine, think again.  Not going to happen.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Chromebook
Reviews.Author: huy
Reviews.Content: I like it, very small and compact. Very different from window, but eventually get used to it. Recommended. You can also  mod this into linux,

Reviews.Title: Nice design but you get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: James T Tubbs
Reviews.Content: This laptop is only 2gb ram so it is slow opening web pages.  While the screen is nice at 11 inchesit is a little small.  One feature I liked is the webcam and built in microphone.The other problem is it does not play netflix and some other silverlight movie.This was not good because I wanted the hdmi port specifically to connect to a tv forwatching movies.

Reviews.Title: Netflix fixed -- but Still No Bluetooth headset support.
Reviews.Author: Hard Rock Classic "Hard Rock Classic"
Reviews.Content: There were four things I wanted to do with the Chromebook:  1) Listen to podcasts and music on a Bluetooth headset - Not yet  2) Stream Netflix ~ Fixed !  3) Remote desktop to my windows 7 PC - Fixed !  4) General web browsing - always workedMy android phone does most of these things. I have not tried remote desktop on the phone because the screen is so small, and it lacks a keyboard.It turns out that the only thing on my list that the Chromebook is good at is web browsing.It does not connect to a Bluetooth headset.It is good as a general web tool, and it streams Amazon and YouTube videos fine. And now Netflix tooAnd it is silent.= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =I tried Chrome Remote Desktop, and at first I was not very happy with it due to the issue of readability vs. screen size. After a while,  I came up with a workaround: Set the resolution on the remote system to the Chromebook's screen size. Then set Chrome Remote Desktop to both "Original Size" and "Full Screen" and the remote system screen now looks good.= = = = = = = = =Update:  Yay they fixed NetFlix != = = = = = = = =
